2518  {
2519  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "probing failed.\n");
2520  }
2521 
2522 end:
2523  free(buf);
2524  buf = NULL;
2525  return ret;
2526 }
2527 
2528 static uint64_t find_vp9_next_packet(uint8_t *p_dst, ni_vp9_header_info_t *vp9_info)
2529 {
2530  uint64_t data_size;
2531  uint64_t i = curr_found_pos ? curr_found_pos : vp9_info->header_length;
2532  if (i + 12 >= total_file_size)
2533  {
2534  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2535  "%s reaching end, curr_pos %llu "
2536  "total input size %llu\n",
2537  __func__, (unsigned long long)curr_found_pos, (unsigned long long)total_file_size);
2538 
2539  if (g_repeat > 1)
2540  {
2541  g_repeat--;
2542  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "input processed, %d left\n", g_repeat);
2543  reset_data_buf_pos();
2544  }
2545  return 0;
2546  }
2552  data_size =
2553  ((g_curr_cache_pos[i]) + (g_curr_cache_pos[i + 1] << 8) +
2554  (g_curr_cache_pos[i + 2] << 16) + (g_curr_cache_pos[i + 3] << 24));
2555  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "vp9 packet data_size %u\n", data_size);
2556  i += 12;
2557  curr_found_pos = i;
2558  if (i + data_size > total_file_size)
2559  {
2560  data_size = total_file_size - i;
2561  memcpy(p_dst, &g_curr_cache_pos[i], data_size);
2562  curr_found_pos = total_file_size;
2563  return data_size;
2564  }
2565 
2566  memcpy(p_dst, &g_curr_cache_pos[i], data_size);
2567  curr_found_pos = i + data_size; // point to the start of data packet
2568  return data_size;
2569 }
2570 
2571 static int vp9_parse_header(ni_vp9_header_info_t *vp9_info, uint8_t *buf,
2572  int size_bytes)
2573 {
2574  ni_bitstream_reader_t br;
2575  ni_bitstream_reader_init(&br, buf, 8 * size_bytes);
2576 
2577  ni_bs_reader_skip_bits(&br, 32); // skip signature
2578  ni_bs_reader_skip_bits(&br, 16); // skip version
2579 
2580  vp9_info->header_length = ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8);
2581  vp9_info->header_length |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 8;
2582 
2583  ni_bs_reader_skip_bits(&br, 32); // skip codec fucc
2584 
2585  vp9_info->width = ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8);
2586  vp9_info->width |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 8;
2587 
2588  vp9_info->height = ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8);
2589  vp9_info->height |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 8;
2590 
2591  vp9_info->timebase.den = ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8);
2592  vp9_info->timebase.den |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 8;
2593  vp9_info->timebase.den |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 16;
2594  vp9_info->timebase.den |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 24;
2595 
2596  vp9_info->timebase.num = ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8);
2597  vp9_info->timebase.num |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 8;
2598  vp9_info->timebase.num |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 16;
2599  vp9_info->timebase.num |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 24;
2600 
2601  vp9_info->total_frames = ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8);
2602  vp9_info->total_frames |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 8;
2603  vp9_info->total_frames |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 16;
2604  vp9_info->total_frames |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 8) << 24;
2605 
2606  if (vp9_info->header_length != 32)
2607  {
2608  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Parse faled: header_length %d != 32\n",
2609  vp9_info->header_length);
2610  return -1;
2611  }
2612  ni_bs_reader_skip_bits(&br, 32); // unused bytes
2613  // here we skip frame header(12 bytes) to get profile
2614  ni_bs_reader_skip_bits(&br, 8 * 12);
2615  if (ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 2) != 0x2) // frame marker
2616  {
2617  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Invalid frame marker\n");
2618  return -1;
2619  }
2620  int profile = 0;
2621  profile = ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 1);
2622  profile |= ni_bs_reader_get_bits(&br, 1) << 1;
2623  if ((profile != 0) && (profile != 2))
2624  {
2625  ni_log(
2626  NI_LOG_ERROR,
2627  "Only support profile0(yuv420,8bit) and profile2(yuv420, 10bit)\n");
2628  return -1;
2629  }
2630  vp9_info->profile = profile;
2631  return 0;
2632 }
2633 
2634 // probe vp9 stream info; return 0 if stream can be decoded, -1 otherwise
2635 static int probe_vp9_stream_info(ni_vp9_header_info_t *vp9_info)
2636 {
2637  int ret = -1;
2638  uint8_t *buf = NULL;
2639 
2640  if (NULL == (buf = calloc(1, 64)))
2641  {
2642  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
2643  "Error probe_vp9_stream_info: allocate stream buf failed\n");
2644  goto end;
2645  }
2646 
2647  reset_data_buf_pos();
2648  uint32_t size_bytes = 64;
2649  if (32 + 12 + 1 >= total_file_size)
2650  {
2651  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "No frame data probed!\n");
2652  goto end;
2653  } else
2654  {
2655  if (size_bytes > total_file_size)
2656  size_bytes = total_file_size;
2657  memcpy(buf, &g_curr_cache_pos[curr_found_pos], size_bytes);
2658  }
2659 
2660  ret = vp9_parse_header(vp9_info, buf, size_bytes);
2661  if (ret)
2662  {
2663  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Failed to parse vp9 header info\n");
2664  goto end;
2665  }
2666  reset_data_buf_pos();
2667  curr_found_pos +=
2668  vp9_info->header_length; // packets data starts after ivf file header
2669 
2670 end:
2671  free(buf);
2672  buf = NULL;
2673  return ret;
2674 }
2675 
2676 static int write_dmabuf_data(uint8_t *pdata, FILE *fp, int width, int height,
2677  int format)
2678 {
2679  if (!pdata || !fp)
2680  return -1;
2681 
2682  switch (format)
2683  {
2684  case GC620_I420:
2685  {
2686  int write_width = width;
2687  int write_height = height;
2688  int plane_width;
2689  int plane_height;
2690  int j;
2691  uint8_t *src = pdata;
2692 
2693  // write Y stride
2694  if (fwrite(pdata, write_width * write_height, 1, fp) != 1)
2695  {
2696  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing Y stride error!\n");
2697  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(fp));
2698  return -1;
2699  }
2700 
2701  int width_aligned = (((width + 127) / 128) * 128);
2702  int height_aligned = ((height + 1) / 2) * 2;
2703  int luma_size = width_aligned * height_aligned;
2704  pdata = src + luma_size;
2705 
2706  // write U stride
2707  plane_height = height / 2;
2708  plane_width = (((int)(write_width) / 2 + 127) / 128) * 128;
2709  write_height /= 2;
2710  write_width /= 2;
2711  for (j = 0; j < plane_height; j++)
2712  {
2713  if (j < write_height && fwrite(pdata, write_width, 1, fp) != 1)
2714  {
2715  fprintf(stderr,
2716  "Error: writing U stride: height %d error!\n",
2717  height);
2718  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(fp));
2719  return -1;
2720  }
2721  pdata += plane_width;
2722  }
2723 
2724  int chroma_b_size;
2725  int chroma_width_aligned = ((((width / 2) + 127) / 128) * 128);
2726  int chroma_height_aligned = height_aligned / 2;
2727  chroma_b_size = chroma_width_aligned * chroma_height_aligned;
2728 
2729  // write V stride
2730  pdata = src + luma_size + chroma_b_size;
2731 
2732  for (j = 0; j < plane_height; j++)
2733  {
2734  if (j < write_height && fwrite(pdata, write_width, 1, fp) != 1)
2735  {
2736  fprintf(stderr,
2737  "Error: writing V stride: height %d error!\n",
2738  height);
2739  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(fp));
2740  return -1;
2741  }
2742  pdata += plane_width;
2743  }
2744  break;
2745  }
2746  case GC620_RGBA8888:
2747  {
2748  if (fwrite(pdata, width * height * 4, 1, fp) != 1)
2749  {
2750  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing rgba data error!\n");
2751  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(fp));
2752  return -1;
2753  }
2754  break;
2755  }
2756  case GC620_RGB888_PLANAR:
2757  {
2758  int stride_size = NI_VPU_ALIGN32(width * height);
2759  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2760  {
2761  if (fwrite(pdata, width * height, 1, fp) != 1)
2762  {
2763  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing bgrp data error!\n");
2764  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(fp));
2765  return -1;
2766  }
2767  pdata += stride_size;
2768  }
2769  break;
2770  }
2771 
2772  default:
2773  break;
2774  }
2775 
2776  if (fflush(fp))
2777  {
2778  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing data frame flush failed! errno %d\n",
2779  errno);
2780  }
2781 
2782  return 0;
2783 }
2784 
2785 static int calc_frame_buffer_size(int width, int height, int format)
2786 {
2787  int width_aligned = width;
2788  int height_aligned = height;
2789  int data_len = 0;
2790  switch (format)
2791  {
2792  case GC620_I420:
2793  {
2794  width_aligned = ((width + 127) / 128) * 128;
2795  height_aligned = ((height + 1) / 2) * 2;
2796  int luma_size = width_aligned * height_aligned;
2797  int chroma_b_size;
2798  int chroma_r_size;
2799  int chroma_width_aligned = (((width / 2) + 127) / 128) * 128;
2800  int chroma_height_aligned = height_aligned / 2;
2801  chroma_b_size = chroma_r_size =
2802  chroma_width_aligned * chroma_height_aligned;
2803  data_len = luma_size + chroma_b_size + chroma_r_size;
2804  break;
2805  }
2806  case GC620_RGBA8888:
2807  {
2808  data_len = width * height * 4;
2809  break;
2810  }
2811  case GC620_RGB888_PLANAR:
2812  {
2813  data_len = NI_VPU_ALIGN32(width * height) * 3;
2814  break;
2815  }
2816 
2817  default:
2818  break;
2819  }
2820  return data_len;
2821 }
2822 
2823 static ni_pixel_planar_format get_pixel_planar(ni_pix_fmt_t pix_fmt)
2824 {
2825  ni_pixel_planar_format ret = -1;
2826  switch (pix_fmt)
2827  {
2828  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
2829  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
2830  ret = NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_SEMIPLANAR;
2831  break;
2832  case NI_PIX_FMT_8_TILED4X4:
2833  case NI_PIX_FMT_10_TILED4X4:
2834  ret = NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_TILED4X4;
2835  break;
2836  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
2837  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
2838  ret = NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_PLANAR;
2839  break;
2840  default:
2841  break;
2842  }
2843 
2844  return ret;
2845 }
2846 
2847 /*!*****************************************************************************
2848  * \brief Write hwdl data to files.
2849  *
2850  * \param
2851  *
2852  * \return 0 if successful, < 0 otherwise
2853  ******************************************************************************/
2854 int write_rawvideo_data(FILE *p_file, int width, int height, int format,
2855  ni_frame_t *p_out_frame)
2856 {
2857  if (p_file && p_out_frame)
2858  {
2859  if (format == GC620_I420)
2860  {
2861  int i, j;
2862  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2863  {
2864  uint8_t *src = p_out_frame->p_data[i];
2865  int write_width = width;
2866  int write_height = height;
2867  int plane_width = width;
2868  int plane_height = height;
2869 
2870  write_width *= 1; // bit depth 1
2871 
2872  if (i == 1 || i == 2)
2873  {
2874  plane_height /= 2;
2875  // U/V stride size is multiple of 128, following the calculation
2876  // in ni_decoder_frame_buffer_alloc
2877  plane_width =
2878  (((int)(write_width) / 2 * 1 + 127) / 128) * 128;
2879  write_height /= 2;
2880  write_width /= 2;
2881  }
2882 
2883  for (j = 0; j < plane_height; j++)
2884  {
2885  if (j < write_height &&
2886  fwrite(src, write_width, 1, p_file) != 1)
2887  {
2888  fprintf(
2889  stderr,
2890  "Error: writing data plane %d: height %d error!\n",
2891  i, plane_height);
2892  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n",
2893  ferror(p_file));
2894  }
2895  src += plane_width;
2896  }
2897  }
2898  } else if (format == GC620_RGBA8888)
2899  {
2900  uint8_t *src = p_out_frame->p_data[0];
2901  if (fwrite(src, width * height * 4, 1, p_file) != 1)
2902  {
2903  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(p_file));
2904  }
2905  } else if (format == GC620_RGB888_PLANAR)
2906  {
2907  uint8_t *src;
2908  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2909  {
2910  src = p_out_frame->p_data[i];
2911  if (fwrite(src, width * height, 1, p_file) != 1)
2912  {
2913  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(p_file));
2914  }
2915  }
2916  }
2917 
2918  if (fflush(p_file))
2919  {
2920  fprintf(stderr,
2921  "Error: writing data frame flush failed! errno %d\n",
2922  errno);
2923  }
2924  }
2925  return 0;
2926 }
2927 
2928 #ifndef _WIN32
2929 /*!*****************************************************************************
2930  * \brief Read dmabuf data(4k aligned) to cpu for test.
2931  *
2932  * \param
2933  *
2934  * \return 0 if successful, < 0 otherwise
2935  ******************************************************************************/
2936 int read_from_dmabuf(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface,
2937  disp_buffer_t *disp, int format, FILE *fp)
2938 {
2939  if (!disp)
2940  {
2941  printf("Error: Invalid input params\n");
2942  return -1;
2943  }
2944  int ret = 0;
2945  int data_len = calc_frame_buffer_size(p_surface->ui16width,
2946  p_surface->ui16height, format);
2947  data_len = (data_len + 4095) & ~4095; // must be 4096 bytes aligned
2948  if (!data_len)
2949  {
2950  printf("Error: read size is 0!\n");
2951  return -1;
2952  }
2953 
2954  disp->fd = -1;
2955  disp->mmap_data = MAP_FAILED;
2956  disp->len = data_len;
2957  disp->bar = 4;
2958 
2959  ret = ni_scaler_p2p_frame_acquire(p_ctx, p_surface, data_len);
2960  if (ret != 0)
2961  {
2962  printf("failed to export dma buf\n");
2963  return -1;
2964  }
2965  disp->fd = p_surface->dma_buf_fd;
2966 
2967  //mmap
2968  disp->mmap_data =
2969  mmap(0, data_len, PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, disp->fd, 0);
2970  if (disp->mmap_data == MAP_FAILED)
2971  {
2972  printf("failed to mmap dmabuf: %s\n", strerror(errno));
2973  return -1;
2974  }
2975 
2976  uint8_t *data = NULL;
2977  ret = posix_memalign((void **)&data, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), disp->len);
2978  if (ret)
2979  {
2980  printf("failed to allocate memory\n");
2981  return -1;
2982  }
2983  disp->data = data;
2984 
2985  // write data to output file
2986  uint8_t *pdata = NULL;
2987  pdata = malloc(data_len);
2988  if (!pdata)
2989  {
2990  printf("failed to allocate data\n");
2991  if (fp)
2992  fclose(fp);
2993  free(pdata);
2994  return -1;
2995  }
2996 
2997  struct netint_iocmd_issue_request uis;
2998  memset(&uis, 0, sizeof(uis));
2999  uis.fd = disp->fd;
3000  uis.data = disp->data;
3001  uis.len = disp->len;
3002  uis.dir = NI_DMABUF_READ_FROM_DEVICE;
3003  memset(disp->data, 0, disp->len);
3004  ret = ioctl(p_ctx->netint_fd, NETINT_IOCTL_ISSUE_REQ, &uis);
3005  if (ret < 0)
3006  {
3007  printf("failed to send req: %s\n", strerror(errno));
3008  if (fp)
3009  fclose(fp);
3010  free(pdata);
3011  return -1;
3012  }
3013 
3014  // poll to check if read complete
3015  struct pollfd pfds[1];
3016  pfds[0].fd = disp->fd;
3017  pfds[0].events = POLLOUT;
3018  pfds[0].revents = 0;
3019  ret = poll(pfds, 1, -1);
3020  if (ret < 0)
3021  {
3022  printf("failed to poll\n");
3023  if (fp)
3024  fclose(fp);
3025  free(pdata);
3026  return -1;
3027  }
3028 
3029  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "data ox%lx, data_len %u\n", (unsigned long)disp->data,
3030  data_len);
3031  memcpy(pdata, disp->data, data_len);
3032 
3033  if (fp)
3034  {
3035  if (0 !=
3036  write_dmabuf_data(pdata, fp, p_surface->ui16width,
3037  p_surface->ui16height, format))
3038  {
3039  printf("failed to write file\n");
3040  if (fp)
3041  fclose(fp);
3042  free(pdata);
3043  return -1;
3044  }
3045  free(pdata);
3046  }
3047 
3048  return 0;
3049 }
3050 #endif
3051 
3052 /*!*****************************************************************************
3053  * \brief Download hw frames by HwDesc.
3054  *
3055  * \param
3056  *
3057  * \return 0 if successful, < 0 otherwise
3058  ******************************************************************************/
3059 int hwdl_frame(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
3060  ni_session_data_io_t *p_session_data, ni_frame_t *p_src_frame,
3061  int output_format)
3062 {
3063  niFrameSurface1_t *src_surf = (niFrameSurface1_t *)(p_src_frame->p_data[3]);
3064  int ret = 0;
3065  int pixel_format;
3066 
3067  switch (output_format)
3068  {
3069  case GC620_I420:
3070  pixel_format = NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P;
3071  break;
3072  case GC620_RGBA8888:
3073  pixel_format = NI_PIX_FMT_RGBA;
3074  break;
3075  case GC620_RGB888_PLANAR:
3076  pixel_format = NI_PIX_FMT_BGRP;
3077  break;
3078  default:
3079  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Pixel format not supported.\n");
3080  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
3081  }
3082 
3083  ret = ni_frame_buffer_alloc_dl(&(p_session_data->data.frame),
3084  src_surf->ui16width, src_surf->ui16height,
3085  pixel_format);
3086 
3087  if (ret != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
3088  {
3089  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
3090  }
3091 
3092  p_ctx->is_auto_dl = false;
3093  ret = ni_device_session_hwdl(p_ctx, p_session_data, src_surf);
3094  if (ret <= 0)
3095  {
3096  ni_frame_buffer_free(&p_session_data->data.frame);
3097  return ret;
3098  }
3099  return ret;
3100 }
3101 
3102 /*!*****************************************************************************
3103  * \brief Send decoder input data
3104  *
3105  * \param
3106  *
3107  * \return
3108  ******************************************************************************/
3109 ni_retcode_t decoder_send_data(ni_session_context_t *p_dec_ctx,
3110  ni_session_data_io_t *p_in_data, int sos_flag,
3111  int input_video_width, int input_video_height,
3112  int pkt_size, unsigned long file_size,
3113  unsigned long *total_bytes_sent, int print_time,
3114  device_state_t *p_device_state,
3115  void *stream_info)
3116 {
3117  static uint8_t tmp_buf[NI_MAX_TX_SZ] = {0};
3118  uint8_t *tmp_buf_ptr = tmp_buf;
3119  int packet_size = pkt_size;
3120  // int chunk_size = 0;
3121  uint32_t frame_pkt_size = 0, nal_size;
3122  int nal_type = -1;
3123  int tx_size = 0;
3124  uint32_t send_size = 0;
3125  int new_packet = 0;
3126  int saved_prev_size = 0;
3127  int32_t frame_num = -1, curr_frame_num;
3128  unsigned int first_mb_in_slice = 0;
3129  ni_packet_t *p_in_pkt = &(p_in_data->data.packet);
3130  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
3131 
3132  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "===> decoder_send_data <===\n");
3133 
3134  if (p_device_state->dec_eos_sent)
3135  {
3136  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "decoder_send_data: ALL data (incl. eos) sent "
3137  "already!\n");
3138  LRETURN;
3139  }
3140 
3141  // TBD Demo: decoder flush at 200th packet
3142 #if 0
3143  if (200 == p_dec_ctx->pkt_num)
3144  {
3145  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != ni_device_dec_session_flush(p_dec_ctx))
3146  {
3147  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "decoder_send_data: mid-flush failed!\n");
3148  exit(-1);
3149  }
3150  }
3151 #endif
3152 
3153  if (0 == p_in_pkt->data_len)
3154  {
3155  memset(p_in_pkt, 0, sizeof(ni_packet_t));
3156 
3157  if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 == p_dec_ctx->codec_format)
3158  {
3159  ni_h264_sps_t *sps;
3160  sps = (ni_h264_sps_t *)stream_info;
3161  // send whole encoded packet which ends with a slice NAL
3162  while ((nal_size = find_h264_next_nalu(tmp_buf_ptr, &nal_type)) > 0)
3163  {
3164  frame_pkt_size += nal_size;
3165  tmp_buf_ptr += nal_size;
3166  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s nal %d nal_size %d\n", __func__,
3167  nal_type, nal_size);
3168 
3169  // save parsed out sps/pps as stream headers in the decode session
3170  if (H264_NAL_PPS == nal_type)
3171  {
3172  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS !=
3173  ni_device_dec_session_save_hdrs(p_dec_ctx, tmp_buf,
3174  frame_pkt_size))
3175  {
3176  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "decoder_send_data: save_hdr failed!\n");
3177  }
3178  }
3179 
3180  if (H264_NAL_SLICE == nal_type ||
3181  H264_NAL_IDR_SLICE == nal_type)
3182  {
3183  if (!parse_h264_slice_header(tmp_buf_ptr - nal_size,
3184  nal_size, sps, &curr_frame_num,
3185  &first_mb_in_slice))
3186  {
3187  if (-1 == frame_num)
3188  {
3189  // first slice, continue to check
3190  frame_num = curr_frame_num;
3191  } else if (curr_frame_num != frame_num ||
3192  0 == first_mb_in_slice)
3193  {
3194  // this slice has diff. frame_num or first_mb_in_slice addr is
3195  // 0: not the same frame and return
3196  rewind_data_buf_pos_by(nal_size);
3197  frame_pkt_size -= nal_size;
3198  break;
3199  }
3200  // this slice is in the same frame, so continue to check and see
3201  // if there is more
3202  } else
3203  {
3204  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3205  "decoder_send_data: parse_slice_header error "
3206  "NAL type %d size %u, continue\n",
3207  nal_type, nal_size);
3208  }
3209  } else if (-1 != frame_num)
3210  {
3211  // already got a slice and this is non-slice NAL: return
3212  rewind_data_buf_pos_by(nal_size);
3213  frame_pkt_size -= nal_size;
3214  break;
3215  }
3216  // otherwise continue until a slice is found
3217  } // while there is still NAL
3218  } else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265 == p_dec_ctx->codec_format)
3219  {
3220  while ((nal_size = find_h265_next_nalu(tmp_buf_ptr, &nal_type)) > 0)
3221  {
3222  frame_pkt_size += nal_size;
3223  tmp_buf_ptr += nal_size;
3224  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s nal_type %d nal_size %d\n", __func__,
3225  nal_type, nal_size);
3226 
3227  if (nal_type == HEVC_NAL_VPS || nal_type == HEVC_NAL_SPS ||
3228  nal_type == HEVC_NAL_PPS) // save vps, sps, pps
3229  {
3230  if (nal_type == 32 && p_dec_ctx->prev_size > 0)
3231  {
3232  // sequence change situation, replace previous p_leftover with new headers
3233  p_dec_ctx->prev_size = 0;
3234  }
3235  // copy the nal to the end of p_leftover
3236  memcpy(p_dec_ctx->p_leftover + p_dec_ctx->prev_size,
3237  tmp_buf_ptr - nal_size, nal_size);
3238  p_dec_ctx->prev_size += nal_size;
3239  }
3240 
3241  if (nal_type >= 0 && nal_type <= 23) // vcl units
3242  {
3243  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s send vcl_nal %d nal_size %d\n",
3244  __func__, nal_type, nal_size);
3245  break;
3246  }
3247  }
3248  } else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_VP9 == p_dec_ctx->codec_format)
3249  {
3250  while ((packet_size = find_vp9_next_packet(tmp_buf_ptr, stream_info)) > 0)
3251  {
3252  frame_pkt_size += packet_size;
3253  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s vp9 packet_size %d\n", __func__,
3254  packet_size);
3255  break;
3256  }
3257  } else
3258  {
3259  frame_pkt_size = read_next_chunk(tmp_buf, packet_size);
3260  // chunk_size = frame_pkt_size;
3261  }
3262  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "decoder_send_data * frame_pkt_size %d\n",
3263  frame_pkt_size);
3264 
3265  p_in_pkt->p_data = NULL;
3266  p_in_pkt->data_len = frame_pkt_size;
3267 
3268  if (frame_pkt_size + p_dec_ctx->prev_size > 0)
3269  {
3270  ni_packet_buffer_alloc(p_in_pkt,
3271  (int)frame_pkt_size + p_dec_ctx->prev_size);
3272  }
3273 
3274  new_packet = 1;
3275  send_size = frame_pkt_size + p_dec_ctx->prev_size;
3276  saved_prev_size = p_dec_ctx->prev_size;
3277  } else
3278  {
3279  send_size = p_in_pkt->data_len;
3280  }
3281 
3282  p_in_pkt->start_of_stream = sos_flag;
3283  p_in_pkt->end_of_stream = 0;
3284  p_in_pkt->video_width = input_video_width;
3285  p_in_pkt->video_height = input_video_height;
3286 
3287  if (send_size == 0)
3288  {
3289  if (new_packet)
3290  {
3291  send_size =
3292  ni_packet_copy(p_in_pkt->p_data, tmp_buf, 0,
3293  p_dec_ctx->p_leftover, &p_dec_ctx->prev_size);
3294  // todo save offset
3295  }
3296  p_in_pkt->data_len = send_size;
3297 
3298  if (curr_found_pos)
3299  {
3300  p_in_pkt->end_of_stream = 1;
3301  printf("Sending p_last packet (size %u) + eos\n", p_in_pkt->data_len);
3302  }
3303  } else
3304  {
3305  if (new_packet)
3306  {
3307  send_size =
3308  ni_packet_copy(p_in_pkt->p_data, tmp_buf, frame_pkt_size,
3309  p_dec_ctx->p_leftover, &p_dec_ctx->prev_size);
3310  // todo: update offset with send_size
3311  // p_in_pkt->data_len is the actual packet size to be sent to decoder
3312  p_in_pkt->data_len += saved_prev_size;
3313  }
3314  }
3315 
3316  tx_size =
3317  ni_device_session_write(p_dec_ctx, p_in_data, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
3318 
3319  if (tx_size < 0)
3320  {
3321  // Error
3322  fprintf(stderr, "Error: sending data error. rc:%d\n", tx_size);
3323  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
3324  LRETURN;
3325  } else if (tx_size == 0)
3326  {
3327  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "0 byte sent this time, sleep and will re-try.\n");
3328  ni_usleep(10000);
3329  } else if ((uint32_t)tx_size < send_size)
3330  {
3331  if (print_time)
3332  {
3333  //printf("Sent %d < %d , re-try next time ?\n", tx_size, send_size);
3334  }
3335  }
3336 
3337  *total_bytes_sent += tx_size;
3338 
3339  if (p_dec_ctx->ready_to_close)
3340  {
3341  p_device_state->dec_eos_sent = 1;
3342  }
3343 
3344  if (print_time)
3345  {
3346  printf("decoder_send_data: success, total sent: %lu\n",
3347  *total_bytes_sent);
3348  }
3349 
3350  if (tx_size > 0)
3351  {
3352  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "decoder_send_data: reset packet_buffer.\n");
3353  ni_packet_buffer_free(p_in_pkt);
3354  }
3355 
3356 #if 0
3357  bytes_sent += chunk_size;
3358  printf("[W] %d percent %d bytes sent. rc:%d result:%d\n", bytes_sent*100/file_size, chunk_size, rc, result);
3359  sos_flag = 0;
3360  if (NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL == rc)
3361  {
3362  printf("Buffer Full.\n");
3363  }
3364  else if (rc != 0)
3365  {
3366  // Error
3367  fprintf(stderr, "Error: sending data error. rc:%d result:%d.\n", rc, result);
3368  err_flag = 1;
3369  return 2;
3370  }
3371 #endif
3372 
3373  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
3374 
3375  END;
3376 
3377  return retval;
3378 }
3379 
3380 /*!*****************************************************************************
3381  * \brief Receive decoded output data from decoder
3382  *
3383  * \param
3384  *
3385  * \return 0: got YUV frame; 1: end-of-stream; 2: got nothing
3386  ******************************************************************************/
3387 int decoder_receive_data(ni_session_context_t *p_dec_ctx,
3388  ni_session_data_io_t *p_out_data,
3389  int output_video_width, int output_video_height,
3390  FILE *p_file, unsigned long long *total_bytes_received,
3391  int print_time, int write_to_file,
3392  device_state_t *p_device_state,
3393  int * p_rx_size)
3394 {
3395  int rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
3396  int end_flag = 0;
3397  int rx_size = 0;
3398  bool b_is_hwframe = p_dec_ctx->hw_action;
3399  ni_frame_t *p_out_frame = &(p_out_data->data.frame);
3400  int width, height;
3401  // In decoder session read function it will allocate the actual YUV
3402  // transfer size for the very first read. And the pixel format of session
3403  // context would be set as well. So it does not matter with the planar
3404  // format for the first call of this function.
3405  int is_planar = get_pixel_planar(p_dec_ctx->pixel_format) == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_PLANAR;
3406 
3407  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "===> decoder_receive_data hwframe %d <===\n", b_is_hwframe);
3408 
3409  if (p_device_state->dec_eos_received)
3410  {
3411  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "decoder_receive_data eos received already, Done!\n");
3412  rc = 2;
3413  LRETURN;
3414  }
3415 
3416  // prepare memory buffer for receiving decoded frame
3417  width = p_dec_ctx->actual_video_width > 0 ?
3418  (int)(p_dec_ctx->actual_video_width) :
3419  output_video_width;
3420  height = p_dec_ctx->active_video_height > 0 ?
3421  (int)(p_dec_ctx->active_video_height) :
3422  output_video_height;
3423 
3424  // allocate memory only after resolution is known (for buffer pool set up)
3425  int alloc_mem = (p_dec_ctx->active_video_width > 0 &&
3426  p_dec_ctx->active_video_height > 0 ?
3427  1 :
3428  0);
3429  if (!b_is_hwframe)
3430  {
3431  rc = ni_decoder_frame_buffer_alloc(
3432  p_dec_ctx->dec_fme_buf_pool, &(p_out_data->data.frame), alloc_mem,
3433  width, height, p_dec_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264,
3434  p_dec_ctx->bit_depth_factor, is_planar);
3435  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != rc)
3436  {
3437  LRETURN;
3438  }
3439  rx_size = ni_device_session_read(p_dec_ctx, p_out_data,
3440  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
3441  } else
3442  {
3443  rc = ni_frame_buffer_alloc(
3444  &(p_out_data->data.frame), width, height,
3445  p_dec_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264, 1,
3446  p_dec_ctx->bit_depth_factor,
3447  3 /*3 is max supported hwframe output count per frame*/, is_planar);
3448  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != rc)
3449  {
3450  LRETURN;
3451  }
3452  rx_size = ni_device_session_read_hwdesc(p_dec_ctx, p_out_data,
3453  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
3454  }
3455 
3456  end_flag = p_out_frame->end_of_stream;
3457 
3458  if (rx_size < 0)
3459  {
3460  fprintf(stderr, "Error: receiving data error. rc:%d\n", rx_size);
3461  if (!b_is_hwframe)
3462  {
3463  ni_decoder_frame_buffer_free(&(p_out_data->data.frame));
3464  } else
3465  {
3466  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(p_out_data->data.frame));
3467  }
3468  rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
3469  LRETURN;
3470  } else if (rx_size > 0)
3471  {
3472  number_of_frames++;
3473  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Got frame # %" PRIu64 " bytes %d\n",
3474  p_dec_ctx->frame_num, rx_size);
3475 
3476  ni_dec_retrieve_aux_data(p_out_frame);
3477  }
3478  // rx_size == 0 means no decoded frame is available now
3479  if (rx_size > 0 && p_file && write_to_file)
3480  {
3481  int i, j;
3482  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
3483  {
3484  uint8_t *src = p_out_frame->p_data[i];
3485  int plane_height = p_dec_ctx->active_video_height;
3486  int plane_width = p_dec_ctx->active_video_width;
3487  int write_height = output_video_height;
3488  int write_width = output_video_width;
3489 
3490  // support for 8/10 bit depth
3491  // plane_width is the actual Y stride size
3492  write_width *= p_dec_ctx->bit_depth_factor;
3493 
3494  if (i == 1 || i == 2)
3495  {
3496  plane_height /= 2;
3497  // U/V stride size is multiple of 128, following the calculation
3498  // in ni_decoder_frame_buffer_alloc
3499  plane_width = (((int)(p_dec_ctx->actual_video_width) / 2 *
3500  p_dec_ctx->bit_depth_factor +
3501  127) /
3502  128) *
3503  128;
3504  write_height /= 2;
3505  write_width /= 2;
3506  }
3507 
3508  // apply the cropping windown in writing out the YUV frame
3509  // for now the windown is usually crop-left = crop-top = 0, and we
3510  // use this to simplify the cropping logic
3511  for (j = 0; j < plane_height; j++)
3512  {
3513  if (j < write_height &&
3514  fwrite(src, write_width, 1, p_file) != 1)
3515  {
3516  fprintf(stderr,
3517  "Error: writing data plane %d: height %d error!\n",
3518  i, plane_height);
3519  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(p_file));
3520  }
3521  src += plane_width;
3522  }
3523  }
3524  if (fflush(p_file))
3525  {
3526  fprintf(stderr,
3527  "Error: writing data frame flush failed! errno %d\n",
3528  errno);
3529  }
3530  }
3531 
3532  *total_bytes_received += rx_size;
3533  *p_rx_size = rx_size;
3534 
3535  if (print_time)
3536  {
3537  printf("[R] Got:%d Frames= %u fps=%f Total bytes %llu\n", rx_size,
3538  number_of_frames,
3539  ((float)number_of_frames /
3540  (float)(current_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec)),
3541  (unsigned long long)*total_bytes_received);
3542  }
3543 
3544  if (end_flag)
3545  {
3546  printf("Decoder Receiving done.\n");
3547  p_device_state->dec_eos_received = 1;
3548  rc = 1;
3549  } else if (0 == rx_size)
3550  {
3551  rc = 2;
3552  }
3553 
3554  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "decoder_receive_data: success\n");
3555 
3556  END;
3557 
3558  return rc;
3559 }
3560 
3561 // convert various reconfig and demo modes (stored in encoder configuration) to
3562 // aux data and store them in frame
3563 void prep_reconf_demo_data(ni_session_context_t *p_enc_ctx, ni_frame_t *frame)
3564 {
3565  ni_xcoder_params_t *api_param =
3566  (ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_enc_ctx->p_session_config;
3567  ni_aux_data_t *aux_data = NULL;
3568 
3569  switch (api_param->reconf_demo_mode)
3570  {
3571  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_BR:
3572  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3573  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3574  {
3575  aux_data = ni_frame_new_aux_data(
3576  frame, NI_FRAME_AUX_DATA_BITRATE, sizeof(int32_t));
3577  if (!aux_data)
3578  {
3579  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3580  "Error %s(): no mem for reconf BR aux_data\n",
3581  __func__);
3582  return;
3583  }
3584  *((int32_t *)aux_data->data) =
3585  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3586  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu reconfig BR by frame %d\n",
3587  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3588  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3589 
3590  g_reconfigCount++;
3591  }
3592  break;
3593  /*
3594  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_INTRAPRD:
3595  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3596  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3597  {
3598  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->enable_option |=
3599  NI_SET_CHANGE_PARAM_INTRA_PARAM;
3600  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->intraQP =
3601  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3602  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->intraPeriod =
3603  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2];
3604  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->repeatHeaders =
3605  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][3];
3606  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
3607  "%s(): frame #%lu reconf intraQP %d intraPeriod %d "
3608  "repeatHeaders %d\n",
3609  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3610  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->intraQP,
3611  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->intraPeriod,
3612  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->repeatHeaders);
3613 
3614  // frame reconf_len needs to be set here
3615  frame->reconf_len = sizeof(ni_encoder_change_params_t);
3616  g_reconfigCount++;
3617  }
3618  break;
3619  */
3620  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_VUI_HRD:
3621  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3622  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3623  {
3624  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->enable_option |=
3625  NI_SET_CHANGE_PARAM_VUI_HRD_PARAM;
3626  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->colorDescPresent =
3627  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3628  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->colorPrimaries =
3629  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2];
3630  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->colorTrc =
3631  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][3];
3632  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->colorSpace =
3633  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][4];
3634  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->aspectRatioWidth =
3635  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][5];
3636  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->aspectRatioHeight =
3637  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][6];
3638  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->videoFullRange =
3639  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][7];
3640 
3641  // frame reconf_len needs to be set here
3642  frame->reconf_len = sizeof(ni_encoder_change_params_t);
3643  g_reconfigCount++;
3644  }
3645  break;
3646  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_LONG_TERM_REF:
3647  // the reconf file data line format for this is:
3648  // <frame-number>:useCurSrcAsLongtermPic,useLongtermRef where
3649  // values will stay the same on every frame until changed.
3650  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3651  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3652  {
3653  aux_data = ni_frame_new_aux_data(
3654  frame, NI_FRAME_AUX_DATA_LONG_TERM_REF,
3655  sizeof(ni_long_term_ref_t));
3656  if (!aux_data)
3657  {
3658  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3659  "Error %s(): no mem for reconf LTR aux_data\n",
3660  __func__);
3661  return;
3662  }
3663  ni_long_term_ref_t *ltr = (ni_long_term_ref_t *)aux_data->data;
3664  ltr->use_cur_src_as_long_term_pic =
3665  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3666  ltr->use_long_term_ref =
3667  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2];
3668 
3669  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
3670  "%s(): frame #%lu reconf LTR "
3671  "use_cur_src_as_long_term_pic %u use_long_term_ref "
3672  "%u\n",
3673  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3674  ltr->use_cur_src_as_long_term_pic, ltr->use_long_term_ref);
3675 
3676  g_reconfigCount++;
3677  }
3678  break;
3679  /*
3680  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_RC_MIN_MAX_QP:
3681  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3682  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3683  {
3684  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->enable_option |=
3685  NI_SET_CHANGE_PARAM_RC_MIN_MAX_QP;
3686  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->minQpI =
3687  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3688  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->maxQpI =
3689  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2];
3690  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->minQpPB =
3691  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][3];
3692  p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params->maxQpPB =
3693  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][4];
3694 
3695  // frame reconf_len needs to be set here
3696  frame->reconf_len = sizeof(ni_encoder_change_params_t);
3697  g_reconfigCount++;
3698  }
3699  break;
3700  */
3701  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_LTR_INTERVAL:
3702  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3703  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3704  {
3705  aux_data = ni_frame_new_aux_data(
3706  frame, NI_FRAME_AUX_DATA_LTR_INTERVAL, sizeof(int32_t));
3707  if (!aux_data)
3708  {
3709  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error %s(): no mem for reconf LTR interval "
3710  "aux_data\n",
3711  __func__);
3712  return;
3713  }
3714  *((int32_t *)aux_data->data) =
3715  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3716  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu reconf LTR interval %d\n",
3717  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3718  *((int32_t *)aux_data->data));
3719 
3720  g_reconfigCount++;
3721  }
3722  break;
3723  case XCODER_TEST_INVALID_REF_FRAME:
3724  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3725  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3726  {
3727  aux_data = ni_frame_new_aux_data(
3728  frame, NI_FRAME_AUX_DATA_INVALID_REF_FRAME,
3729  sizeof(int32_t));
3730  if (!aux_data)
3731  {
3732  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error %s(): no mem for reconf invalid ref "
3733  "frame aux_data\n",
3734  __func__);
3735  return;
3736  }
3737  *((int32_t *)aux_data->data) =
3738  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3739  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu reconf invalid ref frame %d\n",
3740  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3741  *((int32_t *)aux_data->data));
3742 
3743  g_reconfigCount++;
3744  }
3745  break;
3746  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_FRAMERATE:
3747  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3748  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3749  {
3750  aux_data = ni_frame_new_aux_data(
3751  frame, NI_FRAME_AUX_DATA_FRAMERATE, sizeof(ni_framerate_t));
3752  if (!aux_data)
3753  {
3754  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3755  "Error %s(): no mem for reconf framerate aux_data\n",
3756  __func__);
3757  return;
3758  }
3759  ni_framerate_t *framerate = (ni_framerate_t *)aux_data->data;
3760  framerate->framerate_num =
3761  (int32_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3762  framerate->framerate_denom =
3763  (int32_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2];
3764 
3765  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
3766  "%s(): frame #%lu reconfig framerate by frame (%d/%d)\n",
3767  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num, framerate->framerate_num,
3768  framerate->framerate_denom);
3769 
3770  g_reconfigCount++;
3771  }
3772  break;
3773  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_MAX_FRAME_SIZE:
3774  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3775  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3776  {
3777  aux_data = ni_frame_new_aux_data(
3778  frame, NI_FRAME_AUX_DATA_MAX_FRAME_SIZE, sizeof(int32_t));
3779  if (!aux_data)
3780  {
3781  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3782  "Error %s(): no mem for reconf maxFrameSize aux_data\n",
3783  __func__);
3784  return;
3785  }
3786  *((int32_t *)aux_data->data) =
3787  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3788  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu reconfig maxFrameSize by frame %d\n",
3789  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3790  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3791 
3792  g_reconfigCount++;
3793  }
3794  break;
3795  case XCODER_TEST_FORCE_IDR_FRAME:
3796  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3797  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3798  {
3799  ni_force_idr_frame_type(p_enc_ctx);
3800  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu force IDR frame\n", __func__,
3801  p_enc_ctx->frame_num);
3802  g_reconfigCount++;
3803  }
3804  break;
3805  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_BR_API:
3806  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3807  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3808  {
3809  ni_reconfig_bitrate(p_enc_ctx,
3810  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3811  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu API reconfig BR %d\n",
3812  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3813  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3814  g_reconfigCount++;
3815  }
3816  break;
3817  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_VUI_HRD_API:
3818  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3819  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3820  {
3821  ni_vui_hrd_t vui;
3822  vui.colorDescPresent =
3823  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3824  vui.colorPrimaries =
3825  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2];
3826  vui.colorTrc =
3827  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][3];
3828  vui.colorSpace =
3829  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][4];
3830  vui.aspectRatioWidth =
3831  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][5];
3832  vui.aspectRatioHeight =
3833  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][6];
3834  vui.videoFullRange =
3835  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][7];
3836 
3837  ni_reconfig_vui(p_enc_ctx, &vui);
3838  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu API reconfig VUI HRD "
3839  "colorDescPresent %d colorPrimaries %d "
3840  "colorTrc %d colorSpace %d aspectRatioWidth %d "
3841  "aspectRatioHeight %d videoFullRange %d\n",
3842  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3843  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1],
3844  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2],
3845  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][3],
3846  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][4],
3847  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][5],
3848  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][6],
3849  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][7]);
3850  g_reconfigCount++;
3851  }
3852  break;
3853  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_LTR_API:
3854  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3855  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3856  {
3857  ni_long_term_ref_t ltr;
3858  ltr.use_cur_src_as_long_term_pic =
3859  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3860  ltr.use_long_term_ref =
3861  (uint8_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2];
3862 
3863  ni_set_ltr(p_enc_ctx, &ltr);
3864  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu API set LTR\n", __func__,
3865  p_enc_ctx->frame_num);
3866  g_reconfigCount++;
3867  }
3868  break;
3869  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_LTR_INTERVAL_API:
3870  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3871  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3872  {
3873  ni_set_ltr_interval(p_enc_ctx,
3874  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3875  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu API set LTR interval %d\n",
3876  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3877  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3878  g_reconfigCount++;
3879  }
3880  break;
3881  case XCODER_TEST_INVALID_REF_FRAME_API:
3882  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3883  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3884  {
3885  ni_set_frame_ref_invalid(
3886  p_enc_ctx, api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3887  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu API set frame ref invalid "
3888  "%d\n",
3889  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3890  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3891  g_reconfigCount++;
3892  }
3893  break;
3894  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_FRAMERATE_API:
3895  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3896  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3897  {
3898  ni_framerate_t framerate;
3899  framerate.framerate_num =
3900  (int32_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1];
3901  framerate.framerate_denom =
3902  (int32_t)api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2];
3903  ni_reconfig_framerate(p_enc_ctx, &framerate);
3904  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
3905  "%s(): frame #%lu API reconfig framerate (%d/%d)\n",
3906  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3907  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1],
3908  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][2]);
3909  g_reconfigCount++;
3910  }
3911  break;
3912  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_MAX_FRAME_SIZE_API:
3913  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num ==
3914  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][0])
3915  {
3916  ni_reconfig_max_frame_size(p_enc_ctx,
3917  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3918  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame #%lu API reconfig maxFrameSize %d\n",
3919  __func__, p_enc_ctx->frame_num,
3920  api_param->reconf_hash[g_reconfigCount][1]);
3921  g_reconfigCount++;
3922  }
3923  break;
3924  case XCODER_TEST_RECONF_OFF:
3925  default:;
3926  }
3927 }
3928 
3929 /*!*****************************************************************************
3930  * \brief Read from input file, send to uploader, retrieve HW descriptor
3931  *
3932  * \param
3933  *
3934  * \return
3935  ******************************************************************************/
3936 int upload_send_data_get_desc(
3937  ni_session_context_t *p_upl_ctx,
3938  ni_session_data_io_t *p_swin_data, //intermediate for swf
3939  ni_session_data_io_t *p_in_data, int input_video_width,
3940  int input_video_height, int pfs, unsigned long file_size,
3941  unsigned long *bytes_sent, int *input_exhausted)
3942 {
3943  static uint8_t tmp_buf[MAX_YUV_FRAME_SIZE];
3944  //volatile static int started = 0;
3945  //volatile static int need_to_resend = 0;
3946  int frame_size = input_video_width * input_video_height * 3 *
3947  p_upl_ctx->bit_depth_factor / 2;
3948  uint32_t chunk_size;
3949  int retval;
3950  ni_frame_t *p_in_frame = &(p_in_data->data.frame); //hwframe
3951  ni_frame_t *p_swin_frame = &(p_swin_data->data.frame); //swframe
3952 
3953  niFrameSurface1_t *dst_surf;
3954 
3955  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "===> upload_send_data <===\n");
3956 
3957  chunk_size = read_next_chunk_from_file(pfs, tmp_buf, frame_size);
3958  if (chunk_size == -1)
3959  {
3960  fprintf(stderr, "Error: could not read file!");
3961  return -1;
3962  }
3963 
3964  p_in_frame->start_of_stream = 0;
3965 
3966  p_in_frame->end_of_stream = 0;
3967  p_in_frame->force_key_frame = 0;
3968  if (chunk_size == 0)
3969  {
3970  p_in_frame->end_of_stream = 1;
3971  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "upload_send_data: read chunk size 0, eos!\n");
3972  *input_exhausted = 1;
3973  }
3974  p_in_frame->video_width = p_swin_frame->video_width = input_video_width;
3975  p_in_frame->video_height = p_swin_frame->video_height = input_video_height;
3976 
3977  // only metadata header for now
3978  p_in_frame->extra_data_len = p_swin_frame->extra_data_len =
3979  NI_APP_ENC_FRAME_META_DATA_SIZE;
3980 
3981  int dst_stride[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS] = {0};
3982  int dst_height_aligned[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS] = {0};
3983  int is_semiplanar = get_pixel_planar(p_upl_ctx->pixel_format) == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_SEMIPLANAR;
3984  ni_get_hw_yuv420p_dim(input_video_width, input_video_height,
3985  p_upl_ctx->bit_depth_factor, is_semiplanar,
3986  dst_stride, dst_height_aligned);
3987 
3988  ni_frame_buffer_alloc_pixfmt(
3989  p_swin_frame,
3990  p_upl_ctx->pixel_format,
3991  input_video_width, input_video_height, dst_stride,
3992  p_upl_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264,
3993  (int)(p_in_frame->extra_data_len));
3994  if (!p_swin_frame->p_data[0])
3995  {
3996  fprintf(stderr, "Error: could not allocate YUV frame buffer!");
3997  return -1;
3998  }
3999 
4000  // alloc dest avframe buff
4001  //can also be ni_frame_buffer_alloc()
4002  ni_frame_buffer_alloc_hwenc(p_in_frame, input_video_width,
4003  input_video_height,
4004  (int)p_in_frame->extra_data_len);
4005  if (!p_in_frame->p_data[3])
4006  {
4007  fprintf(stderr, "Error: could not allocate hw frame buffer!");
4008  return -1;
4009  }
4010 
4011  dst_surf = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_in_frame->p_data[3];
4012 
4013  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "p_dst alloc linesize = %d/%d/%d src height=%d "
4014  "dst height aligned = %d/%d/%d\n",
4015  dst_stride[0], dst_stride[1], dst_stride[2],
4016  input_video_height, dst_height_aligned[0],
4017  dst_height_aligned[1], dst_height_aligned[2]);
4018 
4019  uint8_t *p_src[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS];
4020  int src_stride[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS];
4021  int src_height[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS];
4022 
4023  src_stride[0] = input_video_width * p_upl_ctx->bit_depth_factor;
4024  src_stride[1] = is_semiplanar ? src_stride[0] : src_stride[0] / 2;
4025  src_stride[2] = is_semiplanar ? 0 : src_stride[0] / 2;
4026 
4027  src_height[0] = input_video_height;
4028  src_height[1] = src_height[0] / 2;
4029  src_height[2] = is_semiplanar ? 0 : src_height[1];
4030 
4031  p_src[0] = tmp_buf;
4032  p_src[1] = tmp_buf + src_stride[0] * src_height[0];
4033  p_src[2] = p_src[1] + src_stride[1] * src_height[1];
4034 
4035  ni_copy_hw_yuv420p((uint8_t **)(p_swin_frame->p_data), p_src,
4036  input_video_width, input_video_height,
4037  p_upl_ctx->bit_depth_factor, is_semiplanar, 0,
4038  dst_stride, dst_height_aligned, src_stride, src_height);
4039 
4040  retval = ni_device_session_hwup(p_upl_ctx, p_swin_data, dst_surf);
4041  if (retval < 0)
4042  {
4043  fprintf(stderr, "Error: failed ni_device_session_hwup():%d, frameNum %u\n",
4044  retval, number_of_frames);
4045  //file was read so reset read pointer and try again
4046  data_left_size += chunk_size;
4047  lseek(pfs, chunk_size * number_of_frames, SEEK_SET);
4048  return -1;
4049  } else
4050  {
4051  *bytes_sent += p_swin_frame->data_len[0] + p_swin_frame->data_len[1] +
4052  p_swin_frame->data_len[2] + p_swin_frame->data_len[3];
4053  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "upload_send_data: total sent data size=%lu\n",
4054  *bytes_sent);
4055 
4056  /* TODO Should be within libxcoderAPI*/
4057  dst_surf->ui16width = input_video_width;
4058  dst_surf->ui16height = input_video_height;
4059  dst_surf->ui32nodeAddress = 0; // always 0 offset for upload
4060  dst_surf->encoding_type = is_semiplanar ?
4061  NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_SEMIPLANAR :
4062  NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_PLANAR;
4063  /* */
4064  number_of_frames++;
4065 
4066  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "upload_send_data: FID = %d success, number:%u\n",
4067  dst_surf->ui16FrameIdx, number_of_frames);
4068  }
4069 
4070  return 0;
4071 }
4072 
4073 /*!*****************************************************************************
4074  * \brief Send encoder input data, read from input file
4075  *
4076  * Note: For optimal performance, tmp_buf should be 4k aligned
4077  *
4078  * \param
4079  *
4080  * \return
4081  ******************************************************************************/
4082 int encoder_send_data(ni_session_context_t *p_enc_ctx, void *tmp_buf,
4083  ni_session_data_io_t *p_in_data, int sos_flag,
4084  int input_video_width, int input_video_height, int pfs,
4085  unsigned long file_size, unsigned long *bytes_sent,
4086  device_state_t *p_device_state, int bit_depth, int is_last_input)
4087 {
4088  volatile static int started = 0;
4089  volatile static int need_to_resend = 0;
4090  int frame_size = input_video_width * input_video_height * 3 *
4091  p_enc_ctx->bit_depth_factor / 2;
4092  uint64_t chunk_size;
4093  int oneSent;
4094  ni_frame_t *p_in_frame = &(p_in_data->data.frame);
4095 
4096  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "===> encoder_send_data <===\n");
4097 
4098  if (p_device_state->enc_seq_change == 1)
4099  {
4100  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data: Sequence Change - waiting for previous session to end\n");
4101  return NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4102  }
4103 
4104  if (p_device_state->enc_eos_sent == 1)
4105  {
4106  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data: ALL data (incl. eos) sent "
4107  "already!\n");
4108  return NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4109  }
4110 
4111  if (need_to_resend)
4112  {
4113  goto send_frame;
4114  }
4115 
4116  p_in_frame->start_of_stream = 0;
4117  if (!started || p_enc_ctx->session_run_state == SESSION_RUN_STATE_SEQ_CHANGE_OPENING)
4118  {
4119  started = 1;
4120  p_in_frame->start_of_stream = 1;
4121  }
4122  p_in_frame->end_of_stream = 0;
4123  p_in_frame->force_key_frame = 0;
4124 
4125  p_in_frame->video_width = input_video_width;
4126  p_in_frame->video_height = input_video_height;
4127 
4128  // reset encoder change data buffer
4129  memset(p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params, 0, sizeof(ni_encoder_change_params_t));
4130 
4131  // reset various aux data size
4132  p_in_frame->roi_len = 0;
4133  p_in_frame->reconf_len = 0;
4134  p_in_frame->sei_total_len = 0;
4135 
4136  // collect encode reconfig and demo info and save them as aux data in
4137  // the input frame struct.
4138  prep_reconf_demo_data(p_enc_ctx, p_in_frame);
4139 
4140  chunk_size = read_next_chunk_from_file(pfs, tmp_buf, frame_size);
4141  if (chunk_size == -1)
4142  {
4143  fprintf(stderr, "Error: could not read file!");
4144  return NI_TEST_RETCODE_FAILURE;
4145  }
4146 
4147  if (chunk_size == 0)
4148  {
4149  if (is_last_input)
4150  {
4151  p_in_frame->end_of_stream = 1;
4152  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data: read chunk size 0, eos!\n");
4153  }
4154  else
4155  {
4156  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data: exit to get next input\n");
4157  return NI_TEST_RETCODE_NEXT_INPUT;
4158  }
4159  }
4160 
4161 send_frame:
4162  oneSent = ni_enc_write_from_yuv_buffer(p_enc_ctx, p_in_frame, tmp_buf);
4163  if (oneSent < 0)
4164  {
4165  fprintf(stderr,
4166  "Error: failed ni_device_session_write() for encoder\n");
4167  need_to_resend = 1;
4168  return NI_TEST_RETCODE_FAILURE;
4169  } else if (oneSent == 0 && !p_enc_ctx->ready_to_close)
4170  {
4171  need_to_resend = 1;
4172  } else
4173  {
4174  need_to_resend = 0;
4175  number_of_frames++;
4176 
4177  *bytes_sent += p_in_frame->data_len[0] + p_in_frame->data_len[1] +
4178  p_in_frame->data_len[2] + p_in_frame->data_len[3];
4179  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data: total sent data size=%lu\n",
4180  *bytes_sent);
4181 
4182  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data: success\n");
4183 
4184  if (p_enc_ctx->ready_to_close)
4185  {
4186  if (p_enc_ctx->session_run_state == SESSION_RUN_STATE_SEQ_CHANGE_DRAINING)
4187  {
4188  p_device_state->enc_seq_change = 1;
4189  }
4190  else
4191  {
4192  p_device_state->enc_eos_sent = 1;
4193  }
4194  }
4195 
4196  if (p_enc_ctx->session_run_state == SESSION_RUN_STATE_SEQ_CHANGE_OPENING)
4197  {
4198  p_enc_ctx->session_run_state = SESSION_RUN_STATE_NORMAL;
4199 
4200  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
4201  "encoder_send_data: session_run_state change to %d \n",
4202  p_enc_ctx->session_run_state);
4203  }
4204  }
4205 
4206  ni_frame_wipe_aux_data(p_in_frame);
4207  return NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4208 }
4209 
4210 /*******************************************************************************
4211  * @brief Send encoder input data, directly after receiving from decoder
4212  *
4213  * @param p_enc_ctx encoder context
4214  * p_dec_ctx decoder context
4215  * p_dec_out_data frame returned by decoder
4216  * p_enc_in_data frame to be sent to encoder
4217  *
4218  * @return
4219  ******************************************************************************/
4220 int encoder_send_data2(ni_session_context_t *p_enc_ctx,
4221  uint32_t dec_codec_format,
4222  ni_session_data_io_t *p_dec_out_data,
4223  ni_session_data_io_t *p_enc_in_data, int sos_flag,
4224  int input_video_width, int input_video_height, int pfs,
4225  unsigned long file_size, unsigned long *bytes_sent,
4226  device_state_t *p_device_state)
4227 {
4228  volatile static int started = 0;
4229  volatile static int need_to_resend_2 = 0;
4230  int oneSent;
4231  // pointer to data struct to be sent
4232  ni_session_data_io_t *p_to_send = NULL;
4233  // frame pointer to data frame struct to be sent
4234  ni_frame_t *p_in_frame = NULL;
4235  ni_xcoder_params_t *api_params =
4236  (ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_enc_ctx->p_session_config;
4237  int is_semiplanar = get_pixel_planar(p_enc_ctx->pixel_format) == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_SEMIPLANAR;
4238  int is_hwframe = p_enc_ctx->hw_action != NI_CODEC_HW_NONE;
4239 
4240  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "===> encoder_send_data2 <===\n");
4241 
4242  if (p_device_state->enc_eos_sent == 1)
4243  {
4244  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data2: ALL data (incl. eos) sent "
4245  "already!\n");
4246  return 1;
4247  }
4248 
4249  if (need_to_resend_2)
4250  {
4251  p_to_send = p_enc_in_data;
4252  p_in_frame = &(p_to_send->data.frame);
4253  goto send_frame;
4254  }
4255 
4256  // if the source and target are of the same codec type, AND there is no
4257  // other aux data such as close caption, HDR10 etc, AND no padding required
4258  // (e.g. in the case of 32x32 transcoding that needs padding to 256x128),
4259  // then reuse the YUV frame data layout passed in because it's already in
4260  // the format required by VPU
4261  // Note: for now disable the reuse of decode frame !
4262  if (0/*p_enc_ctx->codec_format == dec_codec_format &&
4263  input_video_width >= NI_MIN_WIDTH &&
4264  input_video_height >= NI_MIN_HEIGHT &&
4265  !p_dec_out_data->data.frame.sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_len &&
4266  !p_dec_out_data->data.frame.sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_len &&
4267  !p_dec_out_data->data.frame.sei_hdr_plus_len &&
4268  !p_dec_out_data->data.frame.sei_cc_len &&
4269  !p_dec_out_data->data.frame.sei_user_data_unreg_len &&
4270  !p_dec_out_data->data.frame.roi_len*/)
4271  {
4272  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
4273  "encoder_send_data2: encoding to the same codec "
4274  "format as the source: %u, NO SEI, reusing the frame struct!\n",
4275  p_enc_ctx->codec_format);
4276  p_to_send = p_dec_out_data;
4277  p_in_frame = &(p_to_send->data.frame);
4278 
4279  p_in_frame->force_key_frame = 0;
4280 
4281  p_in_frame->sei_total_len = p_in_frame->sei_cc_offset =
4282  p_in_frame->sei_cc_len =
4283  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_offset =
4284  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_len =
4285  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_offset =
4286  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_len =
4287  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_plus_offset =
4288  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_plus_len = 0;
4289 
4290  p_in_frame->roi_len = 0;
4291  p_in_frame->reconf_len = 0;
4292  p_in_frame->force_pic_qp = 0;
4293  p_in_frame->extra_data_len = NI_APP_ENC_FRAME_META_DATA_SIZE;
4294  p_in_frame->ni_pict_type = 0;
4295  } else
4296  {
4297  // otherwise have to pad/crop the source and copy to a new frame struct
4298  // and prep for the SEI aux data
4299  p_to_send = p_enc_in_data;
4300  p_in_frame = &(p_to_send->data.frame);
4301  p_in_frame->end_of_stream = p_dec_out_data->data.frame.end_of_stream;
4302  p_in_frame->ni_pict_type = 0;
4303 
4304  // reset encoder change data buffer
4305  memset(p_enc_ctx->enc_change_params, 0,
4306  sizeof(ni_encoder_change_params_t));
4307 
4308  // extra data starts with metadata header, and reset various aux data
4309  // size
4310  p_in_frame->extra_data_len = NI_APP_ENC_FRAME_META_DATA_SIZE;
4311  p_in_frame->roi_len = 0;
4312  p_in_frame->reconf_len = 0;
4313  p_in_frame->sei_total_len = 0;
4314  p_in_frame->force_pic_qp = 0;
4315 
4316  // collect encode reconfig and demo info and save them in the decode out
4317  // frame, to be used in the aux data prep and copy later
4318  prep_reconf_demo_data(p_enc_ctx, &(p_dec_out_data->data.frame));
4319 
4320  int dst_stride[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS] = {0};
4321  int dst_height_aligned[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS] = {0};
4322  bool alignment_2pass_wa = (api_params->cfg_enc_params.lookAheadDepth &&
4323  ((p_enc_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265) ||
4324  (p_enc_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1)));
4325  ni_get_hw_yuv420p_dim(input_video_width, input_video_height,
4326  p_enc_ctx->bit_depth_factor, is_semiplanar,
4327  dst_stride, dst_height_aligned);
4328 
4329  // ROI demo mode takes higher priority over aux data
4330  // Note: when ROI demo modes enabled, supply ROI map for the specified
4331  // range frames, and 0 map for others
4332  if (api_params->roi_demo_mode && api_params->cfg_enc_params.roi_enable)
4333  {
4334  if (p_enc_ctx->frame_num > 90 && p_enc_ctx->frame_num < 300)
4335  {
4336  p_in_frame->roi_len = p_enc_ctx->roi_len;
4337  } else
4338  {
4339  p_in_frame->roi_len = 0;
4340  }
4341  // when ROI enabled, always have a data buffer for ROI
4342  // Note: this is handled separately from ROI through side/aux data
4343  p_in_frame->extra_data_len += p_enc_ctx->roi_len;
4344  }
4345 
4346  int should_send_sei_with_frame = ni_should_send_sei_with_frame(
4347  p_enc_ctx, p_in_frame->ni_pict_type, api_params);
4348 
4349  // data buffer for various SEI: HDR mastering display color volume, HDR
4350  // content light level, close caption, User data unregistered, HDR10+
4351  // etc.
4352  uint8_t mdcv_data[NI_MAX_SEI_DATA];
4353  uint8_t cll_data[NI_MAX_SEI_DATA];
4354  uint8_t cc_data[NI_MAX_SEI_DATA];
4355  uint8_t udu_data[NI_MAX_SEI_DATA];
4356  uint8_t hdrp_data[NI_MAX_SEI_DATA];
4357 
4358  // prep for auxiliary data (various SEI, ROI) in p_in_frame, based on
4359  // the data returned in decoded frame and also reconfig and demo modes
4360  // collected in prep_reconf_demo_data
4361  ni_enc_prep_aux_data(
4362  p_enc_ctx, p_in_frame, &(p_dec_out_data->data.frame),
4363  p_enc_ctx->codec_format, should_send_sei_with_frame, mdcv_data,
4364  cll_data, cc_data, udu_data, hdrp_data);
4365 
4366  p_in_frame->extra_data_len += p_in_frame->sei_total_len;
4367 
4368  // data layout requirement: leave space for reconfig data if at least
4369  // one of reconfig, SEI or ROI is present
4370  // Note: ROI is present when enabled, so use encode config flag instead
4371  // of frame's roi_len as it can be 0 indicating a 0'd ROI map
4372  // setting !
4373  if (p_in_frame->reconf_len || p_in_frame->sei_total_len ||
4374  (api_params->roi_demo_mode &&
4375  api_params->cfg_enc_params.roi_enable))
4376  {
4377  p_in_frame->extra_data_len += sizeof(ni_encoder_change_params_t);
4378  }
4379 
4380  if (!is_hwframe)
4381  {
4382  ni_encoder_sw_frame_buffer_alloc(api_params->cfg_enc_params.planar,
4383  p_in_frame, input_video_width, input_video_height, dst_stride,
4384  p_enc_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264,
4385  (int)(p_in_frame->extra_data_len), alignment_2pass_wa);
4386  if (!p_in_frame->p_data[0])
4387  {
4388  fprintf(stderr, "Error: cannot allocate YUV frame buffer!");
4389  return -1;
4390  }
4391  } else
4392  {
4393  ni_frame_buffer_alloc_hwenc(p_in_frame, input_video_width,
4394  input_video_height,
4395  (int)(p_in_frame->extra_data_len));
4396  if (!p_in_frame->p_data[3])
4397  {
4398  fprintf(stderr, "Error: cannot allocate YUV frame buffer!");
4399  return -1;
4400  }
4401  }
4402 
4403  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
4404  "p_dst alloc linesize = %d/%d/%d src height=%d "
4405  "dst height aligned = %d/%d/%d force_key_frame=%d, "
4406  "extra_data_len=%u"
4407  " sei_size=%u (hdr_content_light_level %u hdr_mastering_display_"
4408  "color_vol %u hdr10+ %u hrd %d) reconf_size=%u roi_size=%u "
4409  "force_pic_qp=%u udu_sei_size=%u "
4410  "use_cur_src_as_long_term_pic %u use_long_term_ref %u\n",
4411  dst_stride[0], dst_stride[1], dst_stride[2], input_video_height,
4412  dst_height_aligned[0], dst_height_aligned[1], dst_height_aligned[2],
4413  p_in_frame->force_key_frame, p_in_frame->extra_data_len,
4414  p_in_frame->sei_total_len,
4415  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_len,
4416  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_len,
4417  p_in_frame->sei_hdr_plus_len, 0, /* hrd is 0 size for now */
4418  p_in_frame->reconf_len, p_in_frame->roi_len,
4419  p_in_frame->force_pic_qp, p_in_frame->sei_user_data_unreg_len,
4420  p_in_frame->use_cur_src_as_long_term_pic,
4421  p_in_frame->use_long_term_ref);
4422 
4423  uint8_t *p_src[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS];
4424  int src_stride[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS];
4425  int src_height[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS];
4426 
4427  src_height[0] = p_dec_out_data->data.frame.video_height;
4428  src_height[1] = src_height[2] = src_height[0] / 2;
4429  src_height[3] = 0;
4430 
4431  src_stride[0] =
4432  (int)(p_dec_out_data->data.frame.data_len[0]) / src_height[0];
4433  src_stride[1] =
4434  (int)(p_dec_out_data->data.frame.data_len[1]) / src_height[1];
4435  src_stride[2] = src_stride[1];
4436  src_stride[3] = 0;
4437 
4438  p_src[0] = p_dec_out_data->data.frame.p_data[0];
4439  p_src[1] = p_dec_out_data->data.frame.p_data[1];
4440  p_src[2] = p_dec_out_data->data.frame.p_data[2];
4441  p_src[3] = p_dec_out_data->data.frame.p_data[3];
4442 
4443  if (!is_hwframe)
4444  { // YUV part of the encoder input data layout
4445  ni_copy_hw_yuv420p(
4446  (uint8_t **)(p_in_frame->p_data), p_src, input_video_width,
4447  input_video_height, p_enc_ctx->bit_depth_factor, is_semiplanar,
4448  ((ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_enc_ctx->p_session_config)
4449  ->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_right,
4450  dst_stride, dst_height_aligned, src_stride, src_height);
4451  } else
4452  {
4453  ni_copy_hw_descriptors((uint8_t **)(p_in_frame->p_data), p_src);
4454  }
4455  // auxiliary data part of the encoder input data layout
4456  ni_enc_copy_aux_data(p_enc_ctx, p_in_frame,
4457  &(p_dec_out_data->data.frame),
4458  p_enc_ctx->codec_format, mdcv_data, cll_data,
4459  cc_data, udu_data, hdrp_data, is_hwframe,
4460  is_semiplanar);
4461  }
4462 
4463  p_in_frame->video_width = input_video_width;
4464  p_in_frame->video_height = input_video_height;
4465 
4466  p_in_frame->start_of_stream = 0;
4467  if (!started)
4468  {
4469  started = 1;
4470  p_in_frame->start_of_stream = 1;
4471  }
4472  // p_in_frame->end_of_stream = 0;
4473 
4474 send_frame:
4475  oneSent = (int)(p_in_frame->data_len[0] + p_in_frame->data_len[1] +
4476  p_in_frame->data_len[2] + p_in_frame->data_len[3]);
4477 
4478  if (oneSent > 0 || p_in_frame->end_of_stream)
4479  {
4480  oneSent = ni_device_session_write(p_enc_ctx, p_to_send,
4481  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
4482  p_in_frame->end_of_stream = 0;
4483  } else
4484  {
4485  goto end_encoder_send_data2;
4486  }
4487 
4488  if (oneSent < 0)
4489  {
4490  fprintf(stderr, "Error: encoder_send_data2\n");
4491  need_to_resend_2 = 1;
4492  return -1;
4493  } else if (oneSent == 0)
4494  {
4495  if (p_device_state->enc_eos_sent == 0 && p_enc_ctx->ready_to_close)
4496  {
4497  need_to_resend_2 = 0;
4498  p_device_state->enc_eos_sent = 1;
4499  } else
4500  {
4501  need_to_resend_2 = 1;
4502  return 2;
4503  }
4504  } else
4505  {
4506  need_to_resend_2 = 0;
4507 
4508  if (p_enc_ctx->ready_to_close)
4509  {
4510  p_device_state->enc_eos_sent = 1;
4511  }
4512 #if 0
4513  *bytes_sent += p_in_frame->data_len[0] + p_in_frame->data_len[1] + p_in_frame->data_len[2]
4514  + p_in_frame->data_len[3];
4515  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data2: total sent data size=%u\n", *bytes_sent);
4516 #endif
4517  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data2: success\n");
4518  }
4519 
4520 end_encoder_send_data2:
4521  return 0;
4522 }
4523 
4524 /*!*****************************************************************************
4525  * \brief Send encoder input data, read from uploader instance hwframe
4526  *
4527  * \param
4528  *
4529  * \return
4530  ******************************************************************************/
4531 int encoder_send_data3(ni_session_context_t *p_enc_ctx,
4532  ni_session_data_io_t *p_in_data, int sos_flag,
4533  int input_video_width, int input_video_height,
4534  device_state_t *p_device_state, int input_exhausted,
4535  int *need_to_resend)
4536 {
4537  volatile static int started = 0;
4538  //*need_to_resend = 0; //bring this outside and have upload check it too
4539 
4540  int oneSent;
4541  ni_frame_t *p_in_frame = &(p_in_data->data.frame);
4542 
4543  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "===> encoder_send_data3 <===\n");
4544 
4545  if (p_device_state->enc_eos_sent == 1)
4546  {
4547  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data3: ALL data (incl. eos) sent "
4548  "already!\n");
4549  return 0;
4550  }
4551 
4552  if (*need_to_resend)
4553  {
4554  goto send_frame;
4555  }
4556 
4557  p_in_frame->start_of_stream = 0;
4558  if (!started)
4559  {
4560  started = 1;
4561  p_in_frame->start_of_stream = 1;
4562  }
4563  p_in_frame->end_of_stream = 0;
4564  p_in_frame->force_key_frame = 0;
4565  if (input_exhausted)
4566  {
4567  p_in_frame->end_of_stream = 1;
4568  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data3: read chunk size 0, eos!\n");
4569  }
4570  p_in_frame->video_width = input_video_width;
4571  p_in_frame->video_height = input_video_height;
4572 
4573  // only metadata header for now
4574  p_in_frame->extra_data_len = NI_APP_ENC_FRAME_META_DATA_SIZE;
4575 
4576 send_frame:
4577  oneSent =
4578  ni_device_session_write(p_enc_ctx, p_in_data, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
4579  if (oneSent < 0)
4580  {
4581  fprintf(stderr,
4582  "Error: failed ni_device_session_write() for encoder\n");
4583  *need_to_resend = 1;
4584  return -1;
4585  } else if (oneSent == 0 && !p_enc_ctx->ready_to_close)
4586  {
4587  *need_to_resend = 1;
4588  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "NEEDED TO RESEND");
4589  } else
4590  {
4591  *need_to_resend = 0;
4592 
4593  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data3: total sent data size=%u\n",
4594  p_in_frame->data_len[3]);
4595 
4596  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_send_data3: success\n");
4597 
4598  if (p_enc_ctx->ready_to_close)
4599  {
4600  p_device_state->enc_eos_sent = 1;
4601  }
4602  }
4603 
4604  return 0;
4605 }
4606 
4607 /*!*****************************************************************************
4608 * \brief Simple scan to Recycle remaining memory bins left around
4609 *
4610 * \param p_pool_tracker - start address of hwdesc pool
4611 *
4612 * \return
4613 ******************************************************************************/
4614 int scan_and_clean_hwdescriptors(niFrameSurface1_t *p_pool_tracker)
4615 {
4616  int i;
4617  int recycled = 0;
4618  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_DR_HWDESC_FRAME_INDEX; i++)
4619  {
4620  if (p_pool_tracker[i].ui16FrameIdx)
4621  {
4622  ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(&p_pool_tracker[i],
4623  p_pool_tracker[i].device_handle);
4624  //zero for tracking purposes
4625  p_pool_tracker[i].ui16FrameIdx = 0;
4626  recycled++;
4627  }
4628  }
4629  return recycled;
4630 }
4631 
4632 /*!*****************************************************************************
4633  * \brief Reopen or reconfig encoder upon sequence change
4634  *
4635  * \param
4636  *
4637  * \return 0 - success got packet
4638  * 1 - received eos
4639  * 2 - got nothing, need retry
4640  * -1 - failure
4641  ******************************************************************************/
4642 int encoder_reinit_session(ni_session_context_t *p_enc_ctx,
4643  ni_session_data_io_t *p_in_data,
4644  ni_session_data_io_t *p_out_data)
4645 {
4646  int ret = NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4647  int new_stride, ori_stride;
4648  bool bIsSmallPicture = false;
4649  ni_frame_t *p_buffered_frame = &(p_in_data->data.frame);
4650  ni_xcoder_params_t *p_api_param = (ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_enc_ctx->p_session_config;
4651  int new_width, new_height;
4652  int new_bit_depth, new_bit_depth_factor;
4653 
4654  new_width = p_buffered_frame->video_width;
4655  new_height = p_buffered_frame->video_height;
4656 
4657  switch (p_buffered_frame->pixel_format)
4658  {
4659  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
4660  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
4661  new_bit_depth = 8;
4662  new_bit_depth_factor = 1;
4663  break;
4664  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
4665  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
4666  new_bit_depth = 10;
4667  new_bit_depth_factor = 2;
4668  break;
4669  default:
4670  new_bit_depth = 8;
4671  new_bit_depth_factor = 1;
4672  break;
4673  }
4674 
4675  new_stride = NI_ALIGN(new_width, 128);
4676  ori_stride = NI_ALIGN(p_enc_ctx->ori_width, 128);
4677  if (p_api_param->cfg_enc_params.lookAheadDepth) {
4678  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "xcoder_encode_reinit 2-pass "
4679  "lookaheadDepth %d\n",
4680  p_api_param->cfg_enc_params.lookAheadDepth);
4681  if ((new_width < NI_2PASS_ENCODE_MIN_WIDTH) ||
4682  (new_height < NI_2PASS_ENCODE_MIN_HEIGHT)) {
4683  bIsSmallPicture = true;
4684  }
4685  }
4686  else {
4687  if ((new_width < NI_MIN_WIDTH) ||
4688  (new_height < NI_MIN_HEIGHT)) {
4689  bIsSmallPicture = true;
4690  }
4691  }
4692 
4693  if (p_api_param->cfg_enc_params.multicoreJointMode) {
4694  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "xcoder_encode_reinit multicore "
4695  "joint mode\n");
4696  if ((new_width < NI_MULTICORE_ENCODE_MIN_WIDTH) ||
4697  (new_height < NI_MULTICORE_ENCODE_MIN_HEIGHT)) {
4698  bIsSmallPicture = true;
4699  }
4700  }
4701 
4702  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "xcoder_encode_reinit resolution: %dx%d->%dx%d "
4703  "pix fmt: %d->%d bIsSmallPicture %d codec %d\n",
4704  ori_stride, p_enc_ctx->ori_height, new_stride, new_height,
4705  p_enc_ctx->ori_pix_fmt, p_buffered_frame->pixel_format,
4706  bIsSmallPicture,
4707  p_enc_ctx->codec_format);
4708 
4709  // fast sequence change without close / open only if new resolution < original resolution
4710  if ((ori_stride*p_enc_ctx->ori_height < new_stride*new_height) ||
4711  (p_enc_ctx->ori_pix_fmt != p_buffered_frame->pixel_format) ||
4712  bIsSmallPicture ||
4713  (p_enc_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_JPEG)) {
4714  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "XCoder encode sequence change by close / re-open session\n");
4715  encoder_close_session(p_enc_ctx, p_in_data, p_out_data);
4716  ret = encoder_init_session(p_enc_ctx, p_in_data, p_out_data, new_width, new_height, new_bit_depth);
4717  }
4718  else {
4719  if (p_enc_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1) {
4720  // AV1 8x8 alignment HW limitation is now worked around by FW cropping input resolution
4721  if (new_width % NI_PARAM_AV1_ALIGN_WIDTH_HEIGHT)
4722  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
4723  "resolution change: AV1 Picture Width not aligned to %d - picture will be cropped\n",
4724  NI_PARAM_AV1_ALIGN_WIDTH_HEIGHT);
4725 
4726  if (new_height % NI_PARAM_AV1_ALIGN_WIDTH_HEIGHT)
4727  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
4728  "resolution change: AV1 Picture Height not aligned to %d - picture will be cropped\n",
4729  NI_PARAM_AV1_ALIGN_WIDTH_HEIGHT);
4730  }
4731  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "XCoder encode sequence change by re-config session (fast path)\n");
4732  ret = encoder_sequence_change(p_enc_ctx, p_in_data, p_out_data, new_width, new_height, new_bit_depth_factor);
4733  }
4734 
4735  // set run state
4736  p_enc_ctx->session_run_state = SESSION_RUN_STATE_SEQ_CHANGE_OPENING; // this state is referenced when sending first frame after sequence change
4737 
4738  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
4739  "encoder_reinit_session: session_run_state change to %d \n",
4740  p_enc_ctx->session_run_state);
4741 
4742  return ret;
4743 }
4744 
4745 static void write_av1_ivf_header(ni_session_context_t *p_enc_ctx,
4746  ni_packet_t *p_out_pkt, uint32_t width,
4747  uint32_t height, bool is_start, FILE *p_file)
4748 {
4749  if (is_start)
4750  {
4751  if (!av1_output_obu)
4752  {
4753  uint8_t start_header[32] = {
4754  0x44, 0x4b, 0x49, 0x46, /* signature: 'DKIF' */
4755  0x00, 0x00, /* version: 0 */
4756  0x20, 0x00, /* length of header in bytes: 32 */
4757  0x41, 0x56, 0x30, 0x31, /* codec FourCC: AV01 */
4758  0x00, 0x07, /* width in pixels(little endian), default 1280 */
4759  0xd0, 0x02, /* height in pixels(little endian), default 720 */
4760  0x1e, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, /* time base numerator, default 30 */
4761  0x01, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, /* time base denominator, default 1 */
4762  0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, /* number of frames in file */
4763  0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00 /* reserved */
4764  };
4765  if (width && height)
4766  {
4767  start_header[12] = width & 0xff;
4768  start_header[13] = ((width >> 8) & 0xff);
4769  start_header[14] = height & 0xff;
4770  start_header[15] = ((height >> 8) & 0xff);
4771  }
4772 
4773  uint32_t frame_num = p_enc_ctx->framerate.framerate_num;
4774  uint32_t frame_denom = p_enc_ctx->framerate.framerate_denom;
4775  if (frame_num && frame_denom)
4776  {
4777  start_header[16] = frame_num & 0xff;
4778  start_header[17] = ((frame_num >> 8) & 0xff);
4779  start_header[18] = ((frame_num >> 16) & 0xff);
4780  start_header[19] = ((frame_num >> 24) & 0xff);
4781  start_header[20] = frame_denom & 0xff;
4782  start_header[21] = ((frame_denom >> 8) & 0xff);
4783  start_header[22] = ((frame_denom >> 16) & 0xff);
4784  start_header[23] = ((frame_denom >> 24) & 0xff);
4785  }
4786 
4787  if (fwrite(start_header, sizeof(start_header), 1, p_file) != 1)
4788  {
4789  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing ivf start header fail!\n");
4790  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(p_file));
4791  }
4792  }
4793  } else
4794  {
4795  int meta_size = p_enc_ctx->meta_size;
4796  int temp_index;
4797  uint32_t data_len = p_out_pkt->data_len - meta_size;
4798  if (av1_seq_header_len)
4799  data_len += av1_seq_header_len - meta_size;
4800  for (temp_index = 0; temp_index < p_out_pkt->av1_buffer_index;
4801  temp_index++)
4802  {
4803  data_len += p_out_pkt->av1_data_len[temp_index] - meta_size;
4804  }
4805  if (!av1_output_obu)
4806  {
4807  uint32_t pts = muxed_number_of_packets;
4808 
4809  // ivf frame header
4810  // bytes 0-3: size of frame in bytes(not including the 12-byte header
4811  // byte 4-11: 64-bit pts (here pts=num_of_packets(32-bit), thus here only saves 32-bit
4812  uint8_t ivf_frame_header[12] = {((data_len & 0xff)),
4813  ((data_len >> 8) & 0xff),
4814  ((data_len >> 16) & 0xff),
4815  ((data_len >> 24) & 0xff),
4816  ((pts & 0xff)),
4817  ((pts >> 8) & 0xff),
4818  ((pts >> 16) & 0xff),
4819  ((pts >> 24) & 0xff),
4820  0x00,
4821  0x00,
4822  0x00,
4823  0x00};
4824  // write ivf frame header
4825  if (fwrite(ivf_frame_header, 12, 1, p_file) != 1)
4826  {
4827  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing ivf frame header fail!\n");
4828  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(p_file));
4829  }
4830  }
4831  // write av1 sequence header if not written yet
4832  if (av1_seq_header_len)
4833  {
4834  if (fwrite(p_av1_seq_header + meta_size,
4835  av1_seq_header_len - meta_size, 1, p_file) != 1)
4836  {
4837  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing av1 sequence header fail!\n");
4838  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(p_file));
4839  }
4840  ni_aligned_free(p_av1_seq_header);
4841  av1_seq_header_len = 0;
4842  }
4843  // write previous av1 packets
4844  for (temp_index = 0; temp_index < p_out_pkt->av1_buffer_index;
4845  temp_index++)
4846  {
4847  if (fwrite((uint8_t *)p_out_pkt->av1_p_data[temp_index] + meta_size,
4848  p_out_pkt->av1_data_len[temp_index] - meta_size, 1,
4849  p_file) != 1)
4850  {
4851  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing av1 packets fail!\n");
4852  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(p_file));
4853  }
4854  }
4855  // write current packet
4856  if (fwrite((uint8_t *)p_out_pkt->p_data + meta_size,
4857  p_out_pkt->data_len - meta_size, 1, p_file) != 1)
4858  {
4859  fprintf(stderr, "Error: writing av1 packets fail!\n");
4860  fprintf(stderr, "Error: ferror rc = %d\n", ferror(p_file));
4861  }
4862  }
4863 }
4864 
4865 /*!*****************************************************************************
4866  * \brief Receive output data from encoder
4867  *
4868  * \param
4869  *
4870  * \return 0 - success got packet
4871  * 1 - received eos
4872  * 2 - got nothing, need retry
4873  * -1 - failure
4874  ******************************************************************************/
4875 int encoder_receive_data(
4876  ni_session_context_t *p_enc_ctx, ni_session_data_io_t *p_out_data,
4877  int output_video_width, int output_video_height, FILE *p_file,
4878  unsigned long long *total_bytes_received, int print_time,
4879  volatile unsigned int *nb_pkts_received,
4880  ni_session_data_io_t *
4881  p_in_data) //p_in_data is passed in to specify new frame resolution upon sequence change
4882 {
4883  int packet_size = NI_MAX_TX_SZ;
4884  int rc = 0;
4885  int end_flag = 0;
4886  int rx_size = 0;
4887  ni_packet_t *p_out_pkt = &(p_out_data->data.packet);
4888  int meta_size = p_enc_ctx->meta_size;
4889 
4890  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "===> encoder_receive_data <===\n");
4891 
4892  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_enc_ctx->session_id ||
4893  NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE == p_enc_ctx->blk_io_handle)
4894  {
4895  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encode session not opened yet, return\n");
4896  return NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4897  }
4898 
4899 receive_data:
4900  rc = ni_packet_buffer_alloc(p_out_pkt, packet_size);
4901  if (rc != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
4902  {
4903  fprintf(stderr, "Error: malloc packet failed, ret = %d!\n", rc);
4904  return NI_TEST_RETCODE_FAILURE;
4905  }
4906 
4907  rc = ni_device_session_read(p_enc_ctx, p_out_data, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
4908 
4909  end_flag = p_out_pkt->end_of_stream;
4910  rx_size = rc;
4911 
4912  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "encoder_receive_data: received data size=%d\n", rx_size);
4913 
4914  if (rx_size > meta_size)
4915  {
4916  if ((p_enc_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1 && p_file))
4917  {
4918  if (0 == p_enc_ctx->pkt_num)
4919  {
4920  write_av1_ivf_header(p_enc_ctx, p_out_pkt, output_video_width,
4921  output_video_height, 1, p_file);
4922  // save av1 sequence header to p_av1_seq_header
4923  p_av1_seq_header = (uint8_t *)(p_out_pkt->p_data);
4924  av1_seq_header_len = p_out_pkt->data_len;
4925  p_out_pkt->p_buffer = NULL;
4926  p_out_pkt->p_data = NULL;
4927  p_out_pkt->buffer_size = 0;
4928  p_out_pkt->data_len = 0;
4929  } else
4930  {
4931  if (!p_out_pkt->av1_show_frame)
4932  {
4933  p_out_pkt->av1_p_buffer[p_out_pkt->av1_buffer_index] =
