7291  rcPara.p_upl_ctx = (void *)&upl_ctx;
7292  rcPara.p_sca_ctx = (void *)&sca_ctx;
7293  rcPara.p_crop_ctx = (void *)&crop_ctx;
7294  rcPara.p_pad_ctx = (void *)&pad_ctx;
7295  rcPara.p_ovly_ctx = (void *)&ovly_ctx;
7296  rcPara.p_fmt_ctx = (void *)&fmt_ctx;
7297 
7298  enc_ctx.nb_rois = 0;
7299  enc_ctx.roi_side_data_size = 0;
7300  enc_ctx.nb_rois = 0;
7301  enc_ctx.roi_side_data_size = 0;
7302  enc_ctx.av_rois = NULL;
7303 
7304  enc_ctx.codec_format = dst_codec_format;
7305 
7306  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
7307  {
7308  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].nb_rois = 0;
7309  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].roi_side_data_size = 0;
7310  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].nb_rois = 0;
7311  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].roi_side_data_size = 0;
7312  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].av_rois = NULL;
7313 
7314  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].codec_format = dst_codec_format;
7315  }
7316 
7317  if (mode == XCODER_APP_TRANSCODE || mode == XCODER_APP_DECODE ||
7318  mode == XCODER_APP_FILTER)
7319  {
7320  dec_ctx.p_session_config = NULL;
7321  dec_ctx.session_id = NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
7322  dec_ctx.codec_format = src_codec_format;
7323 
7324  // default decode the UDU; ToDo: make it configurable
7325  if (src_codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264)
7326  dec_ctx.enable_user_data_sei_passthru = 1;
7327 
7328  // no need to directly allocate resource context
7329  rcPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx = sdPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7330 
7331  // assign the card GUID in the decoder context and let session open
7332  // take care of the rest
7333  dec_ctx.device_handle = dec_ctx.blk_io_handle =
7334  NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE;
7335  dec_ctx.hw_id = iXcoderGUID;
7336 
7337  dec_ctx.p_session_config = p_dec_api_param;
7338  // default: little endian
7339  dec_ctx.src_bit_depth = bit_depth;
7340  dec_ctx.src_endian = NI_FRAME_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
7341  dec_ctx.bit_depth_factor = 1;
7342  if (10 == dec_ctx.src_bit_depth)
7343  {
7344  dec_ctx.bit_depth_factor = 2;
7345  }
7346 
7347  // check and set ni_decoder_params from --xcoder-params
7348  if (ni_retrieve_decoder_params(decConfXcoderParams, p_dec_api_param,
7349  &dec_ctx)) //
7350  {
7351  fprintf(stderr, "Error: encoder p_config parsing error\n");
7352  return -1;
7353  }
7354  if (p_dec_api_param->dec_input_params.hwframes &&
7355  mode == XCODER_APP_DECODE &&
7356  strcmp(rcPara.fileName, "null") != 0 &&
7357  strcmp(rcPara.fileName, "/dev/null") != 0)
7358  {
7359  fprintf(
7360  stderr,
7361  "Error: decode only with hwframes supports null output only\n");
7362  goto end;
7363  }
7364 
7365  // set async mode of dec_ctx if decoding is low delay AND multi-thread
7366  if (mode == XCODER_APP_DECODE && multi_thread &&
7367  p_dec_api_param->dec_input_params.decoder_low_delay > 0)
7368  {
7369  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "Decoding is low delay AND multi-thread, set "
7370  "async mode of session context !\n");
7371  dec_ctx.async_mode = 1;
7372  }
7373 
7374  // Decode, use all the parameters specified by user
7375  if (0 !=
7376  (ret = decoder_open_session(&dec_ctx, iXcoderGUID, p_dec_api_param)))
7377  {
7378  goto end;
7379  }
7380  }
7381 
7382  if (mode == XCODER_APP_TRANSCODE || mode == XCODER_APP_ENCODE ||
7383  mode == XCODER_APP_HWUP_ENCODE || mode == XCODER_APP_FILTER)
7384  {
7385  // no need to directly allocate resource context for encoder
7386  rcPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx = sdPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7387  rcPara.p_upl_rsrc_ctx = sdPara.p_upl_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7388  rcPara.p_sca_rsrc_ctx = sdPara.p_sca_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7389  rcPara.p_crop_rsrc_ctx = sdPara.p_crop_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7390  rcPara.p_pad_rsrc_ctx = sdPara.p_pad_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7391  rcPara.p_ovly_rsrc_ctx = sdPara.p_ovly_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7392  rcPara.p_fmt_rsrc_ctx = sdPara.p_fmt_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7393  }
7394 
7395  // encoder session open, if needed, will be at the first frame arrival as it
7396  // carries source stream info that may be useful in encoding config
7397 
7398  sos_flag = 1;
7399  total_bytes_received = 0;
7400  xcodeRecvTotal = 0;
7401  total_bytes_sent = 0;
7402 
7403  printf("user video resolution: %dx%d\n", arg_width, arg_height);
7404  if (arg_width == 0 || arg_height == 0)
7405  {
7406  input_video_width = 1280;
7407  input_video_height = 720;
7408  } else
7409  {
7410  input_video_width = arg_width;
7411  input_video_height = arg_height;
7412  }
7413  int output_video_width = input_video_width;
7414  int output_video_height = input_video_height;
7415 
7416  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&start_time, NULL);
7417  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&previous_time, NULL);
7418  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
7419  start_timestamp = privious_timestamp = current_timestamp = time(NULL);
7420 
7421 #if 0
7422 #if __linux__ || __APPLE__
7423  struct timespec start, end;
7424  clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID, &start);
7425 #endif
7426 #endif
7427 
7428  int rx_size;
7429  if (mode == XCODER_APP_DECODE)
7430  {
7431  printf("Decoding Mode: %dx%d to %dx%d HWFrames %d\n", input_video_width,
7432  input_video_height, output_video_width, output_video_height,
7433  dec_ctx.hw_action);
7434  ni_session_data_io_t in_pkt = {0};
7435  ni_session_data_io_t out_frame = {0};
7436  void *p_stream_info = NULL;
7437  if (src_codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264)
7438  p_stream_info = &SPS;
7439  else if (src_codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265)
7440  p_stream_info = &HEVC_SPS;
7441  else if (src_codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_VP9)
7442  p_stream_info = &VP9_INFO;
7443 
7444  if (multi_thread)
7445  {
7446  ni_pthread_t dec_send_tid, dec_recv_tid;
7447  dec_send_param_t dec_send_param = {0};
7448  dec_recv_param_t dec_recv_param = {0};
7449 
7450  dec_send_param.p_dec_ctx = &dec_ctx;
7451  dec_send_param.p_in_pkt = &in_pkt;
7452  dec_send_param.input_video_width = input_video_width;
7453  dec_send_param.input_video_height = input_video_height;
7454  dec_send_param.pkt_size = pkt_size;
7455  dec_send_param.print_time = 0; // not support now
7456  dec_send_param.p_total_bytes_sent = &total_bytes_sent;
7457  dec_send_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
7458  dec_send_param.p_stream_info = p_stream_info;
7459 
7460  dec_recv_param.p_dec_ctx = &dec_ctx;
7461  dec_recv_param.p_out_frame = &out_frame;
7462  dec_recv_param.output_video_width = output_video_width;
7463  dec_recv_param.output_video_height = output_video_height;
7464  dec_recv_param.p_file = p_file;
7465  dec_recv_param.p_total_bytes_received = &total_bytes_received;
7466  dec_recv_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
7467  dec_recv_param.mode = mode;
7468  dec_recv_param.test_frame_list = NULL;
7469 
7470  if (ni_pthread_create(&dec_send_tid, NULL, decoder_send_thread,
7471  &dec_send_param))
7472  {
7473  fprintf(stderr,
7474  "Error: create decoder send thread failed in decode "
7475  "mode\n");
7476  return -1;
7477  }
7478  if (ni_pthread_create(&dec_recv_tid, NULL, decoder_receive_thread,
7479  &dec_recv_param))
7480  {
7481  fprintf(stderr,
7482  "Error: create decoder receive thread failed in decode "
7483  "mode\n");
7484  return -1;
7485  }
7486  ni_pthread_join(dec_send_tid, NULL);
7487  ni_pthread_join(dec_recv_tid, NULL);
7488  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
7489  } else
7490  {
7491  while (send_fin_flag == 0 || receive_fin_flag == 0)
7492  {
7493  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
7494  int print_time =
7495  ((current_time.tv_sec - previous_time.tv_sec) > 1);
7496 
7497  // Sending
7498  send_fin_flag = decoder_send_data(
7499  &dec_ctx, &in_pkt, sos_flag, input_video_width,
7500  input_video_height, pkt_size, total_file_size,
7501  &total_bytes_sent, print_time, &xcodeState, p_stream_info);
7502  sos_flag = 0;
7503  if (send_fin_flag < 0)
7504  {
7505  fprintf(stderr,
7506  "Error: decoder_send_data() failed, rc: %d\n",
7507  send_fin_flag);
7508  break;
7509  }
7510 
7511  // Receiving
7512  do
7513  {
7514  rx_size = 0;
7515  receive_fin_flag = decoder_receive_data(
7516  &dec_ctx, &out_frame, output_video_width,
7517  output_video_height, p_file, &total_bytes_received,
7518  print_time, 1, &xcodeState, &rx_size);
7519  ni_decoder_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
7520 
7521  if (print_time)
7522  {
7523  previous_time = current_time;
7524  }
7525 
7526  // Error or eos
7527  if (receive_fin_flag < 0 || out_frame.data.frame.end_of_stream)
7528  {
7529  break;
7530  }
7531 
7532  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
7533  print_time =
7534  ((current_time.tv_sec - previous_time.tv_sec) > 1);
7535  } while (!dec_ctx.decoder_low_delay && rx_size > 0); //drain consecutive outputs
7536  // Error or eos
7537  if (receive_fin_flag < 0 || out_frame.data.frame.end_of_stream)
7538  {
7539  break;
7540  }
7541  }
7542  }
7543  unsigned int time_diff =
7544  (unsigned int)(current_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec);
7545  if (time_diff == 0)
7546  time_diff = 1;
7547 
7548  printf("[R] Got: Frames= %u fps=%f Total bytes %llu\n",
7549  number_of_frames, ((float)number_of_frames / (float)time_diff),
7550  total_bytes_received);
7551 
7552  ni_device_session_close(&dec_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
7553  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx);
7554  rcPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7555  sdPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7556 
7557  ni_packet_buffer_free(&(in_pkt.data.packet));
7558  ni_decoder_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
7559  } else if (mode == XCODER_APP_ENCODE)
7560  {
7561  printf("Encoding Mode: %dx%d to %dx%d\n", input_video_width,
7562  input_video_height, output_video_width, output_video_height);
7563 
7564  // set up encoder p_config, using some hard coded numbers
7565  if (ni_encoder_init_default_params(p_api_param, 30, 1, 200000, arg_width,
7566  arg_height,
7567  enc_ctx.codec_format) < 0)
7568  {
7569  fprintf(stderr, "Error: encoder init default set up error\n");
7570  return -1;
7571  }
7572 
7573  // check and set ni_encoder_params from --xcoder-params
7574  if (ni_retrieve_xcoder_params(encConfXcoderParams, p_api_param, &enc_ctx))
7575  {
7576  fprintf(stderr, "Error: encoder p_config parsing error\n");
7577  return -1;
7578  }
7579 
7580  // set async mode of enc_ctx if encoding is low delay AND multi-thread
7581  if (multi_thread && p_api_param->low_delay_mode > 0)
7582  {
7583  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "Encoding is low delay AND multi-thread, set "
7584  "async mode of session context !\n");
7585  enc_ctx.async_mode = 1;
7586  }
7587 
7588  ni_hrd_params_t hrd_params;
7589  int video_full_range_flag = 0;
7590  if (p_api_param->video_full_range_flag >= 0)
7591  {
7592  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Using user-configured video_full_range_flag "
7593  "%d\n",
7594  p_api_param->video_full_range_flag);
7595  video_full_range_flag = p_api_param->video_full_range_flag;
7596  }
7597 
7598  // for encode from YUV, use all the parameters specified by user
7599  if (0 !=
7600  (ret = encoder_open_session(
7601  &enc_ctx, dst_codec_format, iXcoderGUID, p_api_param, bit_depth,
7602  arg_width, arg_height, &hrd_params, p_api_param->color_primaries,
7603  p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic, p_api_param->color_space,
7604  video_full_range_flag, p_api_param->sar_num, p_api_param->sar_denom,
7605  is_planar)))
7606  {
7607  goto end;
7608  }
7609 
7610  ni_session_data_io_t in_frame = {0};
7611  ni_session_data_io_t out_packet = {0};
7612 
7613  in_frame.data.frame.pixel_format =
7614  (is_planar ? NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P : NI_PIX_FMT_NV12);
7615  if (10 == bit_depth)
7616  {
7617  in_frame.data.frame.pixel_format =
7618  (is_planar ? NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE : NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE);
7619  }
7620 
7621  if (multi_thread)
7622  {
7623  ni_pthread_t enc_send_tid, enc_recv_tid;
7624  enc_send_param_t enc_send_param = {0};
7625  enc_recv_param_t enc_recv_param = {0};
7626 
7627  enc_send_param.p_enc_ctx = &enc_ctx;
7628  enc_send_param.p_in_frame = &in_frame;
7629  enc_send_param.input_video_width = input_video_width;
7630  enc_send_param.input_video_height = input_video_height;
7631  enc_send_param.pfs = pfs;
7632  memcpy(enc_send_param.input_arg_width, input_arg_width, sizeof(enc_send_param.input_arg_width));
7633  memcpy(enc_send_param.input_arg_height, input_arg_height, sizeof(enc_send_param.input_arg_height));
7634  memcpy(enc_send_param.input_bit_depth, input_bit_depth, sizeof(enc_send_param.input_bit_depth));
7635  memcpy(enc_send_param.input_arg_pfs, input_arg_pfs, sizeof(enc_send_param.input_arg_pfs));
7636  enc_send_param.p_total_bytes_sent = &total_bytes_sent;
7637  enc_send_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
7638  enc_send_param.mode = mode;
7639  enc_send_param.test_frame_list = NULL;
7640  enc_send_param.dec_codec_format = -1; // not use heres
7641  enc_send_param.p_input_exhausted = NULL; // not use heres
7642  enc_send_param.p_hwframe_pool_tracker = NULL; // not use heres
7643  enc_send_param.input_total = input_total;
7644 
7645  enc_recv_param.p_enc_ctx = &enc_ctx;
7646  enc_recv_param.p_out_packet = &out_packet;
7647  enc_recv_param.output_video_width = output_video_width;
7648  enc_recv_param.output_video_height = output_video_height;
7649  enc_recv_param.p_file = p_file;
7650  enc_recv_param.p_total_bytes_received = &total_bytes_received;
7651  enc_recv_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
7652  enc_recv_param.mode = mode;
7653  enc_recv_param.p_hwframe_pool_tracker = NULL;
7654  enc_recv_param.p_buffered_frame = &in_frame;
7655 
7656  if (ni_pthread_create(&enc_send_tid, NULL, encoder_send_thread,
7657  &enc_send_param))
7658  {
7659  fprintf(stderr,
7660  "Error: create encoder send thread failed in encode "
7661  "mode\n");
7662  return -1;
7663  }
7664  if (ni_pthread_create(&enc_recv_tid, NULL, encoder_receive_thread,
7665  &enc_recv_param))
7666  {
7667  fprintf(stderr,
7668  "Error: create encoder recieve thread failed in encode "
7669  "mode\n");
7670  return -1;
7671  }
7672  ni_pthread_join(enc_send_tid, NULL);
7673  ni_pthread_join(enc_recv_tid, NULL);
7674  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
7675  } else
7676  {
7677  uint32_t prev_num_pkt;
7678  void *tmp_buf;
7679  if (ni_memalign(&tmp_buf, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), MAX_YUV_FRAME_SIZE))
7680  {
7681  fprintf(stderr, "Error: Could not allocate YUV data buffer");
7682  ret = -1;
7683  goto end;
7684  }
7685  while (send_fin_flag == NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS || receive_fin_flag == NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
7686  {
7687  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
7688  int print_time =
7689  ((current_time.tv_sec - previous_time.tv_sec) > 1);
7690 
7691  // Sending
7692  send_fin_flag = encoder_send_data(
7693  &enc_ctx, tmp_buf, &in_frame, sos_flag, input_arg_width[input_index],
7694  input_arg_height[input_index], input_arg_pfs[input_index], total_file_size, &total_bytes_sent,
7695  &xcodeState, input_bit_depth[input_index], (input_index == (input_total-1)));
7696  sos_flag = 0;
7697 
7698  if (send_fin_flag == NI_TEST_RETCODE_EAGAIN) //Error - impossible case, since write buffer full is handled by encoder_send_data need_to_resend
7699  {
7700  break;
7701  } else if (send_fin_flag == NI_TEST_RETCODE_NEXT_INPUT) // next input (will trigger sequence change)
7702  {
7703  input_index++;
7704  lseek(input_arg_pfs[input_index], 0, SEEK_END);
7705  total_file_size = lseek(input_arg_pfs[input_index], 0, SEEK_CUR);
7706  lseek(input_arg_pfs[input_index], 0, SEEK_SET);
7707  data_left_size = total_file_size;
7708  send_fin_flag = NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7709  }
7710 
7711  enc_receive:
7712  // Receiving
7713  rx_size = 0; //only set if normal successful read completed
7714  prev_num_pkt = number_of_packets;
7715  receive_fin_flag = encoder_receive_data(
7716  &enc_ctx, &out_packet, output_video_width,
7717  output_video_height, p_file, &total_bytes_received,
7718  print_time, &number_of_packets,
7719  &in_frame); // in_frame is passed in for the new resolution info of sequence change
7720 
7721  if (enc_ctx.codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1 &&
7722  (number_of_packets > prev_num_pkt))
7723  {
7724  if (!out_packet.data.packet.av1_show_frame &&
7725  number_of_packets >= 2)
7726  {
7727  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "AV1 got not shown frames\n");
7728  goto enc_receive;
7729  }
7730  }
7731 
7732  if (print_time)
7733  {
7734  previous_time = current_time;
7735  }
7736 
7737  // Error or eos
7738  if (receive_fin_flag < 0 ||
7739  out_packet.data.packet.end_of_stream)
7740  {
7741  break;
7742  } else if (receive_fin_flag == NI_TEST_RETCODE_SEQ_CHANGE_DONE)
7743  {
7744  xcodeState.enc_seq_change = 0;
7745  receive_fin_flag = NI_TEST_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7746  }
7747  }
7748  ni_aligned_free(tmp_buf);
7749  }
7750  int timeDiff = (int)(current_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec);
7751  if (timeDiff == 0)
7752  timeDiff = 1;
7753  printf("[R] Got: Packets= %u fps=%f Total bytes %llu\n",
7754  number_of_packets,
7755  ((float)number_of_packets) / ((float)timeDiff),
7756  total_bytes_received);
7757 
7758  ni_device_session_close(&enc_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
7759  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx);
7760  rcPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7761  sdPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
7762 
7763  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(in_frame.data.frame));
7764  ni_packet_buffer_free(&(out_packet.data.packet));
7765  } else if (mode == XCODER_APP_HWUP_ENCODE)
7766  {
7767  ni_session_data_io_t in_frame = {0};
7768  ni_session_data_io_t swin_frame = {0};
7769  ni_session_data_io_t out_packet = {0};
7770  printf("Upload + Encoding Mode: %dx%d to %dx%d\n", input_video_width,
7771  input_video_height, output_video_width, output_video_height);
7772 
7773  if (multi_thread)
7774  {
7775  ni_test_frame_list_t test_frame_list = {0};
7776  ni_pthread_t uploader_tid;
7777  uploader_param_t uploader_param = {0};
7778  ni_pthread_t enc_send_tid, enc_recv_tid;
7779  enc_send_param_t enc_send_param = {0};
7780  enc_recv_param_t enc_recv_param = {0};
7781  ni_frame_t *p_ni_frame = NULL;
7782 
7783  //open uploader
7784  int pool_size =
7785  3; //3 starting buffers to be augmented with additional
7786  // buffers by downstream entity like encoders
7787  if (0 !=
7788  (ret = uploader_open_session(&upl_ctx, iXcoderGUID, bit_depth,
7789  arg_width, arg_height,
7790  is_planar, pool_size)))
7791  {
7792  goto end;
7793  }
7794 
7795  uploader_param.p_upl_ctx = &upl_ctx;
7796  uploader_param.p_swin_frame = &swin_frame;
7797  uploader_param.input_video_width = input_video_width;
7798  uploader_param.input_video_height = input_video_height;
7799  uploader_param.pfs = pfs;
7800  uploader_param.p_total_bytes_sent = &total_bytes_sent;
7801  uploader_param.p_input_exhausted = &input_exhausted;
7802  uploader_param.pool_size = pool_size;
7803  uploader_param.test_frame_list = &test_frame_list;
7804 
7805  if (ni_pthread_create(&uploader_tid, NULL, uploader_thread,
7806  &uploader_param))
7807  {
7808  fprintf(
7809  stderr,
7810  "Error: create uploader thread failed in upload mode\n");
7811  return -1;
7812  }
7813 
7814  // wait until received first HW frame
7815  while (test_frames_isempty(&test_frame_list))
7816  {
7817  ni_usleep(100);
7818  }
7819 
7820  p_ni_frame =
7821  &test_frame_list.ni_test_frame[test_frame_list.head].data.frame;
7822  // set up encoder p_config, using some hard coded numbers
7823  if (ni_encoder_init_default_params(p_api_param, 30, 1, 200000,
7824  arg_width, arg_height,
7825  enc_ctx.codec_format) < 0)
7826  {
7827  fprintf(stderr, "Error: encoder init default set up error\n");
7828  return -1;
7829  }
7830 
7831  // check and set ni_encoder_params from --xcoder-params
7832  if (ni_retrieve_xcoder_params(encConfXcoderParams, p_api_param,
7833  &enc_ctx))
7834  {
7835  fprintf(stderr, "Error: encoder p_config parsing error\n");
7836  return -1;
7837  }
7838 
7839  ni_hrd_params_t hrd_params;
7840  int video_full_range_flag = 0;
7841  if (p_api_param->video_full_range_flag >= 0)
7842  {
7843  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Using user-configured video_full_range_flag "
7844  "%d\n", p_api_param->video_full_range_flag);
7845  video_full_range_flag = p_api_param->video_full_range_flag;
7846  }
7847 
7848  //always HWframe mode if preceeded by HWUPLOAD
7849  enc_ctx.hw_action = NI_CODEC_HW_ENABLE;
7850  p_api_param->hwframes = 1;
7851  //to determine if from same device and buffer dimensions in memory
7852  //needs to be done where input frame is available to check
7853  p_hwframe = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_ni_frame->p_data[3];
7854  enc_ctx.sender_handle =
7855  (ni_device_handle_t)(int64_t)p_hwframe->device_handle;
7856  p_api_param->rootBufId = p_hwframe->ui16FrameIdx;
7857 
7858  // for encode from YUV, use all the parameters specified by user
7859  if (0 !=
7860  (ret = encoder_open_session(
7861  &enc_ctx, dst_codec_format, iXcoderGUID, p_api_param, bit_depth,
7862  arg_width, arg_height, &hrd_params, p_api_param->color_primaries,
7863  p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic, p_api_param->color_space,
7864  video_full_range_flag, p_api_param->sar_num, p_api_param->sar_denom,
7865  is_planar)))
7866  {
7867  goto end;
7868  }
7869 
7870  // init and create encoding thread
7871  enc_send_param.p_enc_ctx = &enc_ctx;
7872  enc_send_param.p_in_frame = NULL;
7873  enc_send_param.input_video_width = input_video_width;
7874  enc_send_param.input_video_height = input_video_height;
7875  enc_send_param.pfs = pfs;
7876  enc_send_param.p_total_bytes_sent = &total_bytes_sent;
7877  enc_send_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
7878  enc_send_param.mode = mode;
7879  enc_send_param.test_frame_list = &test_frame_list;
7880  enc_send_param.dec_codec_format = dec_ctx.codec_format;
7881  enc_send_param.p_input_exhausted = &input_exhausted;
7882  enc_send_param.p_hwframe_pool_tracker = hwframe_pool_tracker;
7883 
7884  enc_recv_param.p_enc_ctx = &enc_ctx;
7885  enc_recv_param.p_out_packet = &out_packet;
7886  enc_recv_param.output_video_width = output_video_width;
7887  enc_recv_param.output_video_height = output_video_height;
7888  enc_recv_param.p_file = p_file;
7889  enc_recv_param.p_total_bytes_received = &total_bytes_received;
7890  enc_recv_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
7891  enc_recv_param.mode = mode;
7892  enc_recv_param.p_hwframe_pool_tracker = hwframe_pool_tracker;
7893 
7894  if (ni_pthread_create(&enc_send_tid, NULL, encoder_send_thread,
7895  &enc_send_param))
7896  {
7897  fprintf(stderr,
7898  "Error: create encoder send thread failed in transcode "
7899  "mode\n");
7900  return -1;
7901  }
7902  if (ni_pthread_create(&enc_recv_tid, NULL, encoder_receive_thread,
7903  &enc_recv_param))
7904  {
7905  fprintf(stderr,
7906  "Error: create encoder recieve thread failed in "
7907  "transcode mode\n");
7908  return -1;
7909  }
7910  ni_pthread_join(uploader_tid, NULL);
7911  ni_pthread_join(enc_send_tid, NULL);
7912  ni_pthread_join(enc_recv_tid, NULL);
7913  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
7914  drain_test_list(&enc_send_param, &test_frame_list);
7915  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_BUFFERED_FRAME; i++)
7916  {
7917  ni_frame_buffer_free(
7918  &(test_frame_list.ni_test_frame[i].data.frame));
7919  }
7920  } else
7921  {
7922  //open uploader
7923  int pool_size =
7924  3; //3 starting buffers to be augmented with additional
7925  // buffers by downstream entity like encoders
7926  if (0 !=
7927  (ret = uploader_open_session(&upl_ctx, iXcoderGUID, bit_depth,
7928  arg_width, arg_height,
7929  is_planar, pool_size)))
7930  {
7931  goto end;
7932  }
7933 
7934  //need to have the hwframe before open encoder
7935  if (upload_send_data_get_desc(&upl_ctx, &swin_frame, &in_frame,
7936  input_video_width, input_video_height,
7937  pfs, total_file_size,
7938  &total_bytes_sent, &input_exhausted))
7939  {
7940  fprintf(stderr, "Error: upload frame error\n");
7941  return -1;
7942  }
7943 
7944  // check and set ni_encoder_params from multiple --xcoder-params
7945  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
7946  {
7947  // set up encoder p_config, using some hard coded numbers
7948  if (ni_encoder_init_default_params(
7949  &enc_ladder_api_param[i], 30, 1, 200000, arg_width,
7950  arg_height, enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].codec_format) < 0)
7951  {
7952  fprintf(stderr,
7953  "Error: encoder init default set up error\n");
7954  return -1;
7955  }
7956 
7957  if (ni_retrieve_xcoder_params(encLadderConfXcoderParams[i],
7958  &enc_ladder_api_param[i],
7959  &enc_ladder_ctx_list[i]))
7960  {
7961  fprintf(stderr,
7962  "Error: encoder ladder config parsing error\n");
7963  return -1;
7964  }
7965  }
7966 
7967  ni_hrd_params_t hrd_params_list[MAX_OUTPUT_FILES];
7968  int video_full_range_flag[MAX_OUTPUT_FILES];
7969 
7970  //to determine if from same device and buffer dimensions in memory
7971  //needs to be done where input frame is available to check
7972  p_hwframe = (niFrameSurface1_t *)in_frame.data.frame.p_data[3];
7973 
7974  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
7975  {
7976  if (enc_ladder_api_param[i].video_full_range_flag >= 0)
7977  {
7978  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
7979  "Using user-configured video_full_"
7980  "range_flag [%d] = %d\n",
7981  i, enc_ladder_api_param[i].video_full_range_flag);
7982  video_full_range_flag[i] =
7983  enc_ladder_api_param[i].video_full_range_flag;
7984  }
7985 
7986  // always HWframe mode if by HWUPLOAD
7987  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].hw_action = NI_CODEC_HW_ENABLE;
7988  enc_ladder_api_param[i].hwframes = 1;
7989 
7990  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].sender_handle =
7991  (ni_device_handle_t)(int64_t)p_hwframe->device_handle;
7992  enc_ladder_api_param[i].rootBufId = p_hwframe->ui16FrameIdx;
7993  }
7994 
7995  // for encode from YUV, use all the parameters specified by user
7996  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
7997  {
7998  if (0 !=
7999  (ret = encoder_open_session(
8000  &enc_ladder_ctx_list[i], dst_codec_format, iXcoderGUID,
8001  &enc_ladder_api_param[i], bit_depth, arg_width,
8002  arg_height, &hrd_params_list[i],
8003  enc_ladder_api_param[i].color_primaries,
8004  enc_ladder_api_param[i].color_transfer_characteristic,
8005  enc_ladder_api_param[i].color_space,
8006  video_full_range_flag[i],
8007  enc_ladder_api_param[i].sar_num,
8008  enc_ladder_api_param[i].sar_denom, is_planar)))
8009  {
8010  goto end;
8011  } else
8012  {
8013  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "encoder %d opened ..\n");
8014  }
8015  }
8016  int read_from_file = 0;
8017  int need_to_resend = 0;
8018  unsigned int prev_num_pkt[MAX_OUTPUT_FILES];
8019  uint32_t end_of_stream_list[MAX_OUTPUT_FILES];
8020  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
8021  {
8022  prev_num_pkt[i] = end_of_stream_list[i] = 0;
8023  }
8024 
8025  int end_of_all_streams_or_error = 0;
8026  while (!end_of_all_streams_or_error &&
8027  (send_fin_flag == 0 || receive_fin_flag == 0))
8028  {
8029  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
8030  int print_time =
8031  ((current_time.tv_sec - previous_time.tv_sec) > 1);
8032 
8033  if (read_from_file && !input_exhausted && need_to_resend == 0)
8034  {
8035  if (upload_send_data_get_desc(
8036  &upl_ctx, &swin_frame, &in_frame, input_video_width,
8037  input_video_height, pfs, total_file_size,
8038  &total_bytes_sent, &input_exhausted))
8039  {
8040  if ((&upl_ctx)->status ==
8041  NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL)
8042  {
8043  ni_log(
8044  NI_LOG_DEBUG,
8045  "No space to write to, try to read a packet\n");
8046  goto receive_pkt;
8047  } else
8048  {
8049  fprintf(stderr, "Error: upload frame error\n");
8050  return -1;
8051  }
8052  }
8053  }
8054 
8055  // Sending
8056  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
8057  {
8058  send_fin_flag = encoder_send_data3(
8059  &enc_ladder_ctx_list[i], &in_frame, sos_flag,
8060  input_video_width, input_video_height,
8061  &xcodeStateList[i], input_exhausted, &need_to_resend);
8062  read_from_file =
8063  1; //since first frame read before while-loop
8064 
8065  sos_flag = 0;
8066  if (send_fin_flag == 2) //Error
8067  {
8068  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "enc %d send error, quit !\n", i);
8069  break;
8070  }
8071  //track in array with unique index, free when enc read finds
8072  //this must be implemented in application space for complete
8073  //tracking of hwframes
8074  if (need_to_resend == 0)
8075  {
8076  //successful read means there is recycle to check
8077  uint16_t current_hwframe_index =
8078  ((niFrameSurface1_t *)((uint8_t *)in_frame.data
8079  .frame.p_data[3]))
8080  ->ui16FrameIdx;
8081  ni_hw_frame_ref(
8082  current_hwframe_index,
8083  (uint8_t *)in_frame.data.frame.p_data[3]);
8084  } else
8085  {
8086  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enc %d need to re-send !\n", i);
8087  ni_usleep(500);
8088  i--;
8089  continue;
8090  }
8091  }
8092 
8093  receive_pkt:
8094  // Receiving
8095  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
8096  {
8097  out_packet.data.packet.end_of_stream = 0;
8098 
8099  prev_num_pkt[i] = number_of_packets_list[i];
8100  rx_size =
8101  0; //only set if normal successful read completed
8102  receive_fin_flag = encoder_receive_data(
8103  &enc_ladder_ctx_list[i], &out_packet,
8104  output_video_width, output_video_height, p_file_list[i],
8105  &total_bytes_received_list[i], print_time,
8106  &number_of_packets_list[i],
8107  &in_frame); // in_frame is passed in for future sequence change support (XCODER_APP_HWUP_ENCODE does not support sequence change yet)
8108  recycle_index = out_packet.data.packet.recycle_index;
8109  if (prev_num_pkt[i] < number_of_packets_list[i] &&
8110  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].hw_action && recycle_index > 0 &&
8111  recycle_index < NI_GET_MAX_HWDESC_FRAME_INDEX(
8112  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].ddr_config))
8113  //encoder only returns valid recycle index
8114  //when there's something to recycle.
8115  //This range is suitable for all memory bins
8116  {
8117  ni_hw_frame_unref(recycle_index);
8118  } else
8119  {
8120  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
8121  "enc %d recv, prev_num_pkt %u "
8122  "number_of_packets_list %u recycle_index %u\n",
8123  i, prev_num_pkt[i], number_of_packets_list[i],
8124  recycle_index);
8125  }
8126 
8127  if (prev_num_pkt[i] < number_of_packets_list[i] &&
8128  enc_ladder_ctx_list[i].codec_format ==
8129  NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1)
8130  {
8131  if (!out_packet.data.packet.av1_show_frame &&
8132  number_of_packets_list[i] >= 2)
8133  {
8134  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "AV1 got not shown frames\n");
8135  i--;
8136  continue;
8137  }
8138  }
8139  if (print_time)
8140  {
8141  previous_time = current_time;
8142  }
8143 
8144  end_of_stream_list[i] =
8145  out_packet.data.packet.end_of_stream;
8146  // Error or eos
8147  if (receive_fin_flag < 0)
8148  {
8149  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enc %d error, quit !\n", i);
8150  end_of_all_streams_or_error = 1;
8151  break;
8152  } else
8153  {
8154  for (j = 0; j < output_total; j++)
8155  {
8156  if (0 == end_of_stream_list[j])
8157  {
8158  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
8159  "enc %d continues to read!"
8160  "\n",
8161  j);
8162  end_of_all_streams_or_error = 0;
8163  break;
8164  } else
8165  {
8166  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enc %d eos !\n", j);
8167  end_of_all_streams_or_error = 1;
8168  }
8169  }
8170  if (end_of_all_streams_or_error)
8171  {
8172  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "end of all streams !\n");
8173  break;
8174  }
8175  }
8176  } // enc list read loop
8177  } // encoder send/receive while loop
8178  } // encoder send/receive single thread mode
8179  int timeDiff = (int)(current_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec);
8180  if (timeDiff == 0)
8181  timeDiff = 1;
8182 
8183  if (multi_thread)
8184  {
8185  printf("[R] Got: Packets= %u fps=%f Total bytes %llu\n",
8186  number_of_packets,
8187  ((float)number_of_packets) / ((float)timeDiff),
8188  total_bytes_received);
8189 
8190  num_post_recycled =
8191  scan_and_clean_hwdescriptors(hwframe_pool_tracker);
8192 
8193  ni_device_session_close(&enc_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
8194  } else
8195  {
8196  num_post_recycled =
8197  scan_and_clean_hwdescriptors_ref(hwframe_ref_pool_tracker);
8198 
8199  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
8200  {
8201  printf("[R] Got: enc %d Packets= %u fps=%f Total bytes %llu\n",
8202  (int)i, number_of_packets_list[i],
8203  ((float)number_of_packets_list[i]) / ((float)timeDiff),
8204  total_bytes_received_list[i]);
8205 
8206  ni_device_session_close(&enc_ladder_ctx_list[i], 1,
8207  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
8208 
8209  fclose(p_file_list[i]);
8210  }
8211  }
8212  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Cleanup recycled %d internal buffers\n",
8213  num_post_recycled);
8214 
8215  ni_device_session_close(&upl_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_UPLOAD);
8216  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx);
8217  rcPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8218  sdPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8219  rcPara.p_upl_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8220  sdPara.p_upl_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8221 
8222  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(in_frame.data.frame));
8223  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(swin_frame.data.frame));
8224  ni_packet_buffer_free(&(out_packet.data.packet));
8225  } else if (mode == XCODER_APP_FILTER)
8226  {
8227 #ifndef _WIN32
8228  // not support on windows
8229 
8230  printf("Scaling Mode\n");
8231  // default filter params
8232  ni_filter_params_t filter_params = {0};
8233  filter_params.scale_width = 1280;
8234  filter_params.scale_height = 720;
8235  filter_params.format = GC620_I420;
8236 
8237  if (0 !=
8238  (ret = retrieve_filter_params(scaConfXcoderParams, &filter_params)))
8239  {
8240  return -1;
8241  }
8242  int is_p2p = filter_params.p2p;
8243  int scale_width = filter_params.scale_width;
8244  int scale_height = filter_params.scale_height;
8245  int out_format = filter_params.format;
8246  if (is_p2p)
8247  {
8248  sca_ctx.isP2P = 1;
8249  if (out_format != GC620_I420)
8250  fmt_ctx.isP2P = 1;
8251  else
8252  ovly_ctx.isP2P = 1;
8253  }
8254 
8255  niFrameSurface1_t dec_hwframe_tracker = {0};
8256  niFrameSurface1_t scaler_hwframe_tracker = {0};
8257  niFrameSurface1_t drawbox_hwframe_tracker = {0};
8258  disp_buffer_t *disp1 = NULL;
8259  disp_buffer_t *disp2 = NULL;
8260  if (is_p2p)
8261  {
8262  disp1 = calloc(1, sizeof(disp_buffer_t));
8263  disp2 = calloc(1, sizeof(disp_buffer_t));
8264  }
8265 
8266  ni_session_data_io_t in_pkt = {0};
8267  ni_session_data_io_t out_frame = {0};
8268  FILE *p_ovly_out = NULL;
8269  if (p_file)
8270  {
8271  char *ovly_outfile;
8272  char *p = strtok(rcPara.fileName, ".");
8273  if (!p)
8274  {
8275  ovly_outfile = strcat(rcPara.fileName, "_overlay");
8276  }
8277  while (p)
8278  {
8279  char *name = (char *)malloc(strlen(p));
8280  strcpy(name, p);
8281  strcat(name, "_overlay.");
8282  p = strtok(NULL, ".");
8283  ovly_outfile = strcat(name, p);
8284  break;
8285  }
8286  printf("overlay output filename %s\n", ovly_outfile);
8287  p_ovly_out = fopen(ovly_outfile, "wb");
8288  }
8289 
8290  while (send_fin_flag == 0 || receive_fin_flag == 0)
8291  {
8292  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
8293  int print_time = ((current_time.tv_sec - previous_time.tv_sec) > 1);
8294 
8295  // Sending
8296  send_fin_flag = decoder_send_data(
8297  &dec_ctx, &in_pkt, sos_flag, input_video_width,
8298  input_video_height, pkt_size, total_file_size,
8299  &total_bytes_sent, print_time, &xcodeState, &SPS);
8300  sos_flag = 0;
8301  if (send_fin_flag < 0)
8302  {
8303  fprintf(stderr, "Error: decoder_send_data() failed, rc: %d\n",
8304  send_fin_flag);
8305  break;
8306  }
8307 
8308  // Receiving
8309  receive_fin_flag = decoder_receive_data(
8310  &dec_ctx, &out_frame, output_video_width, output_video_height,
8311  p_file, &total_bytes_received, print_time, 0,
8312  &xcodeState, &rx_size); // not write to file
8313  if (print_time)
8314  {
8315  previous_time = current_time;
8316  }
8317 
8318  if (receive_fin_flag < 0 || out_frame.data.frame.end_of_stream)
8319  {
8320  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
8321  break;
8322  } else if (receive_fin_flag != 2)
8323  {
8324  // got yuv hwframe from decoder. save dec hwframe idx
8325  memcpy(&dec_hwframe_tracker,
8326  (uint8_t *)out_frame.data.frame.p_data[3],
8327  sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t));
8328  niFrameSurface1_t *decoded_surface =
8329  (niFrameSurface1_t *)(out_frame.data.frame.p_data[3]);
8330 
8331  // set decoded frame params
8332  decoded_surface->ui16width = output_video_width;
8333  decoded_surface->ui16height = output_video_height;
8334  decoded_surface->bit_depth = 1;
8335  decoded_surface->encoding_type = NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_PLANAR;
8336 
8337  // scale the decoded frame(always yuv) and write to output file
8338  ni_session_data_io_t scale_session_data = {0};
8339  ret = scale_filter(&sca_ctx, &(out_frame.data.frame),
8340  &scale_session_data, scale_width,
8341  scale_height, out_format);
8342  if (ret != 0)
8343  break;
8344  // Save scaler HwFrameIdx
8345  memcpy(&scaler_hwframe_tracker,
8346  (uint8_t *)(scale_session_data.data.frame.p_data[3]),
8347  sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t));
8348  ret = scaler_output_write(&sca_ctx, &scale_session_data,
8349  scale_width, scale_height, out_format,
8350  p_file, disp1);
8351  if (ret != 0)
8352  break;
8353  if (scaler_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx)
8354  {
8355  ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(
8356  &scaler_hwframe_tracker,
8357  scaler_hwframe_tracker.device_handle);
8358  scaler_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx = 0;
8359  }
8360 
8361  // draw box on the decoded frame and write to output file
8362  ni_session_data_io_t drawbox_session_data = {0};
8363  ret = drawbox_filter(&crop_ctx, &pad_ctx, &ovly_ctx, &fmt_ctx,
8364  &(out_frame.data.frame),
8365  &drawbox_session_data, NULL, out_format);
8366  if (ret != 0)
8367  break;
8368  // Save drawbox HwFrameIdx
8369  memcpy(&drawbox_hwframe_tracker,
8370  (uint8_t *)(drawbox_session_data.data.frame.p_data[3]),
8371  sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t));
8372  if (out_format == GC620_I420)
8373  ret = scaler_output_write(
8374  &ovly_ctx, &drawbox_session_data, output_video_width,
8375  output_video_height, out_format, p_ovly_out, disp2);
8376  else
8377  ret = scaler_output_write(
8378  &fmt_ctx, &drawbox_session_data, output_video_width,
8379  output_video_height, out_format, p_ovly_out, disp2);
8380  if (ret != 0)
8381  break;
8382  if (drawbox_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx)
8383  {
8384  ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(
8385  &drawbox_hwframe_tracker,
8386  drawbox_hwframe_tracker.device_handle);
8387  drawbox_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx = 0;
8388  }
8389 
8390  // free decoded hw frame
8391  if (dec_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx)
8392  {
8393  ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(
8394  &dec_hwframe_tracker,
8395  dec_hwframe_tracker.device_handle);
8396  dec_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx = 0;
8397  }
8398  // free decoded frame and scaler output frame
8399  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
8400  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(scale_session_data.data.frame));
8401  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(drawbox_session_data.data.frame));
8402 
8403  } else
8404  {
8405  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
8406  }
8407  }
8408 
8409  unsigned int time_diff =
8410  (unsigned int)(current_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec);
8411  if (time_diff == 0)
8412  time_diff = 1;
8413 
8414  printf("[R] Got: Frames= %u fps=%f Total bytes %llu\n",
8415  number_of_frames, ((float)number_of_frames / (float)time_diff),
8416  total_bytes_received);
8417 
8418  // close device
8419  if (is_p2p)
8420  {
8421  if (disp1)
8422  {
8423  if (disp1->fd >= 0)
8424  {
8425  if (disp1->mmap_data != MAP_FAILED)
8426  {
8427  munmap((void *)disp1->mmap_data, disp1->len);
8428  }
8429  close(disp1->fd);
8430  free(disp1->data);
8431  }
8432  free(disp1);
8433  }
8434  if (disp2)
8435  {
8436  if (disp2->fd >= 0)
8437  {
8438  if (disp2->mmap_data != MAP_FAILED)
8439  {
8440  munmap((void *)disp2->mmap_data, disp2->len);
8441  }
8442  close(disp2->fd);
8443  free(disp2->data);
8444  }
8445  free(disp2);
8446  }
8447  }
8448 
8449  ni_device_session_close(&dec_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
8450  ni_device_session_close(&sca_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
8451  ni_device_session_close(&crop_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
8452  ni_device_session_close(&pad_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
8453  ni_device_session_close(&ovly_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
8454  if (fmt_ctx.device_handle != NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE)
8455  ni_device_session_close(&fmt_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
8456  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx);
8457  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_sca_rsrc_ctx);
8458  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_crop_rsrc_ctx);
8459  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_pad_rsrc_ctx);
8460  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_ovly_rsrc_ctx);
8461  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_fmt_rsrc_ctx);
8462  rcPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8463  rcPara.p_sca_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8464  rcPara.p_crop_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8465  rcPara.p_pad_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8466  rcPara.p_ovly_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8467  rcPara.p_fmt_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8468  sdPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8469  sdPara.p_sca_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8470  sdPara.p_crop_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8471  sdPara.p_pad_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8472  sdPara.p_ovly_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8473  sdPara.p_fmt_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
8474 
8475  // Recycle hwframe
8476  if (dec_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx)
8477  ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(&dec_hwframe_tracker,
8478  dec_hwframe_tracker.device_handle);
8479 
8480  if (scaler_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx)
8481  ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(&scaler_hwframe_tracker,
8482  scaler_hwframe_tracker.device_handle);
8483 
8484  if (drawbox_hwframe_tracker.ui16FrameIdx)
8485  ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(&drawbox_hwframe_tracker,
8486  drawbox_hwframe_tracker.device_handle);
8487 
8488  ni_packet_buffer_free(&(in_pkt.data.packet));
8489  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
8490 #endif
8491 
8492  } else if (mode == XCODER_APP_TRANSCODE)
8493  {
8494  printf("Xcoding Mode: %dx%d to %dx%d\n", input_video_width,
8495  input_video_height, output_video_width, output_video_height);
8496 
8497  ni_session_data_io_t in_pkt = {0};
8498  ni_session_data_io_t out_frame = {0};
8499  ni_session_data_io_t enc_in_frame = {0};
8500  ni_session_data_io_t out_packet = {0};
8501  uint32_t prev_num_pkt;
8502  ni_frame_t *p_ni_frame = NULL;
8503  void *p_stream_info = NULL;
8504 
8505  if (p_dec_api_param->dec_input_params.semi_planar[0] > 0)
8506  {
8507  is_planar = 0;
8508  }
8509 
8510  if (src_codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264)
8511  p_stream_info = &SPS;
8512  else if (src_codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265)
8513  p_stream_info = &HEVC_SPS;
8514  else if (src_codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_VP9)
8515  p_stream_info = &VP9_INFO;
8516 
8517  if (multi_thread)
8518  {
8519  ni_test_frame_list_t test_frame_list = {0};
8520 
8521  ni_pthread_t dec_send_tid, dec_recv_tid;
8522  dec_send_param_t dec_send_param = {0};
8523  dec_recv_param_t dec_recv_param = {0};
8524 
8525  ni_pthread_t enc_send_tid, enc_recv_tid;
8526  enc_send_param_t enc_send_param = {0};
8527  enc_recv_param_t enc_recv_param = {0};
8528 
8529  // init and create decoding thread
8530  dec_send_param.p_dec_ctx = &dec_ctx;
8531  dec_send_param.p_in_pkt = &in_pkt;
8532  dec_send_param.input_video_width = input_video_width;
8533  dec_send_param.input_video_height = input_video_height;
8534  dec_send_param.pkt_size = pkt_size;
8535  dec_send_param.print_time = 0; // not support now
8536  dec_send_param.p_total_bytes_sent = &total_bytes_sent;
8537  dec_send_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
8538  dec_send_param.p_stream_info = p_stream_info;
8539  dec_recv_param.p_dec_ctx = &dec_ctx;
8540  dec_recv_param.p_out_frame = NULL;
8541  dec_recv_param.output_video_width = output_video_width;
8542  dec_recv_param.output_video_height = output_video_height;
8543  dec_recv_param.p_file = p_file;
8544  dec_recv_param.p_total_bytes_received = &total_bytes_received;
8545  dec_recv_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
8546  dec_recv_param.mode = mode;
8547  dec_recv_param.test_frame_list = &test_frame_list;
8548 
8549  if (ni_pthread_create(&dec_send_tid, NULL, decoder_send_thread,
8550  &dec_send_param))
8551  {
8552  fprintf(stderr,
8553  "Error: create decoder send thread failed in transcode "
8554  "mode\n");
8555  return -1;
8556  }
8557  if (ni_pthread_create(&dec_recv_tid, NULL, decoder_receive_thread,
8558  &dec_recv_param))
8559  {
8560  fprintf(stderr,
8561  "Error: create decoder receive thread failed in "
8562  "transcode mode\n");
8563  return -1;
8564  }
8565 
8566  // wait until received first decoded frame
8567  while (test_frames_isempty(&test_frame_list))
8568  {
8569  ni_usleep(100);
8570  }
8571 
8572  p_ni_frame =
8573  &test_frame_list.ni_test_frame[test_frame_list.head].data.frame;
8574  // open the encode session when the first frame arrives and the session
8575  // is not opened yet, with the source stream and user-configured encode
8576  // info both considered when constructing VUI in the stream headers
8577  int color_pri = p_ni_frame->color_primaries;
8578  int color_trc = p_ni_frame->color_trc;
8579  int color_space = p_ni_frame->color_space;
8580  int video_full_range_flag = p_ni_frame->video_full_range_flag;
8581  int sar_num = p_ni_frame->sar_width;
8582  int sar_den = p_ni_frame->sar_height;
8583  int fps_num = 0, fps_den = 0;
8584 
8585  // calculate the source fps and set it as the default target fps, based
8586  // on the timing_info passed in from the decoded frame
8587  if (p_ni_frame->vui_num_units_in_tick && p_ni_frame->vui_time_scale)
8588  {
8589  if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 == p_ni_frame->src_codec)
8590  {
8591  if (0 == (p_ni_frame->vui_time_scale % 2))
8592  {
8593  fps_num = (int)(p_ni_frame->vui_time_scale / 2);
8594  fps_den = (int)(p_ni_frame->vui_num_units_in_tick);
8595  } else
8596  {
8597  fps_num = (int)(p_ni_frame->vui_time_scale);
8598  fps_den = (int)(2 * p_ni_frame->vui_num_units_in_tick);
8599  }
8600  } else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265 == p_ni_frame->src_codec)
8601  {
8602  fps_num = p_ni_frame->vui_time_scale;
8603  fps_den = p_ni_frame->vui_num_units_in_tick;
8604  }
8605  }
8606 
8607  // set up encoder p_config, using some info from source
8608  if (ni_encoder_init_default_params(p_api_param, fps_num, fps_den,
8609  200000, arg_width, arg_height,
8610  enc_ctx.codec_format) < 0)
8611  {
8612  fprintf(stderr, "Error: encoder init default set up error\n");
8613  return -1;
8614  }
8615 
8616  // check and set ni_encoder_params from --xcoder-params
8617  // Note: the parameter setting has to be in this order so that user
8618  // configured values can overwrite the source/default ones if
8619  // desired.
8620  if (ni_retrieve_xcoder_params(encConfXcoderParams, p_api_param,
8621  &enc_ctx))
8622  {
8623  fprintf(stderr, "Error: encoder p_config parsing error\n");
8624  return -1;
8625  }
8626 
8627  if (color_pri != p_api_param->color_primaries &&
8628  NI_COL_PRI_UNSPECIFIED != p_api_param->color_primaries)
8629  {
8630  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Using user-configured color primaries %d to "
8631  "overwrite source %d\n",
8632  p_api_param->color_primaries, color_pri);
8633  color_pri = p_api_param->color_primaries;
8634  }
8635  if (color_trc != p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic &&
8636  NI_COL_TRC_UNSPECIFIED !=
8637  p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic)
8638  {
8639  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Using user-configured color trc %d to overwrite"
8640  " source %d\n",
8641  p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic,
8642  color_trc);
8643  color_trc = p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic;
8644  }
8645  if (color_space != p_api_param->color_space &&
8646  NI_COL_SPC_UNSPECIFIED != p_api_param->color_space)
8647  {
8648  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Using user-configured color space %d to "
8649  "overwrite source %d\n",
8650  p_api_param->color_space, color_space);
8651  color_space = p_api_param->color_space;
8652  }
8653  if (p_api_param->video_full_range_flag >= 0)
8654  {
8655  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Using user-configured video_full_range_flag "
8656  "%d\n",
8657  p_api_param->video_full_range_flag);
8658  video_full_range_flag = p_api_param->video_full_range_flag;
8659  }
8660  if (p_ni_frame->aspect_ratio_idc > 0 &&
8661  p_ni_frame->aspect_ratio_idc < NI_NUM_PIXEL_ASPECT_RATIO)
8662  {
8663  sar_num =
8664  ni_h264_pixel_aspect_list[p_ni_frame->aspect_ratio_idc].num;
8665  sar_den =
8666  ni_h264_pixel_aspect_list[p_ni_frame->aspect_ratio_idc].den;
8667  } else if (p_api_param->sar_denom)
8668  {
8669  sar_num = p_api_param->sar_num;
8670  sar_den = p_api_param->sar_denom;
8671  }
8672 
8673  ni_hrd_params_t hrd_params;
8674  if (!dec_ctx.hw_action)
8675  {
8676  enc_ctx.hw_action = NI_CODEC_HW_NONE;
8677  } else
8678  {
8679  //Items in this else condition could be improved by being handled in libxcoder
8680  enc_ctx.hw_action = NI_CODEC_HW_ENABLE;
8681  p_api_param->hwframes = 1;
8682  //to determine if from same device and buffer dimensions in memory
8683  //needs to be done where input frame is available to check
8684  p_hwframe = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_ni_frame->p_data[3];
8685  enc_ctx.sender_handle =
8686  (ni_device_handle_t)(int64_t)p_hwframe->device_handle;
8687  p_api_param->rootBufId = p_hwframe->ui16FrameIdx;
8688  }
8689 
8690  if (0 !=
8691  (ret = encoder_open_session(
8692  &enc_ctx, dst_codec_format, iXcoderGUID, p_api_param,
8693  bit_depth, arg_width, arg_height, &hrd_params, color_pri,
8694  color_trc, color_space, video_full_range_flag, sar_num,
8695  sar_den, is_planar)))
8696  {
8697  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: encoder_open_session failed, stop!\n");
8698  goto end;
8699  }
8700 
8701  // init and create encoding thread
8702  enc_send_param.p_enc_ctx = &enc_ctx;
8703  enc_send_param.p_in_frame = &enc_in_frame;
8704  enc_send_param.input_video_width = input_video_width;
8705  enc_send_param.input_video_height = input_video_height;
8706  enc_send_param.pfs = pfs;
8707  enc_send_param.p_total_bytes_sent = &total_bytes_sent;
8708  enc_send_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
8709  enc_send_param.mode = mode;
8710  enc_send_param.test_frame_list = &test_frame_list;
8711  enc_send_param.dec_codec_format = dec_ctx.codec_format;
8712  enc_send_param.p_input_exhausted = NULL; // not use heres
8713  enc_send_param.p_hwframe_pool_tracker = hwframe_pool_tracker;
8714 
8715  enc_recv_param.p_enc_ctx = &enc_ctx;
8716  enc_recv_param.p_out_packet = &out_packet;
8717  enc_recv_param.output_video_width = output_video_width;
8718  enc_recv_param.output_video_height = output_video_height;
8719  enc_recv_param.p_file = p_file;
8720  enc_recv_param.p_total_bytes_received = &xcodeRecvTotal;
8721  enc_recv_param.p_xcodeState = &xcodeState;
8722  enc_recv_param.mode = mode;
8723  enc_recv_param.p_hwframe_pool_tracker = hwframe_pool_tracker;
8724 
8725  if (ni_pthread_create(&enc_send_tid, NULL, encoder_send_thread,
8726  &enc_send_param))
8727  {
8728  fprintf(stderr,
8729  "Error: create encoder send thread failed in transcode "
8730  "mode\n");
8731  return -1;
8732  }
8733  if (ni_pthread_create(&enc_recv_tid, NULL, encoder_receive_thread,
8734  &enc_recv_param))
8735  {
8736  fprintf(stderr,
8737  "Error: create encoder recieve thread failed in "
8738  "transcode mode\n");
8739  return -1;
8740  }
8741  ni_pthread_join(dec_send_tid, NULL);
8742  ni_pthread_join(dec_recv_tid, NULL);
8743  ni_pthread_join(enc_send_tid, NULL);
8744  ni_pthread_join(enc_recv_tid, NULL);
8745  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
8746  drain_test_list(&enc_send_param, &test_frame_list);
8747  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_BUFFERED_FRAME; i++)
8748  {
8749  ni_frame_buffer_free(
8750  &(test_frame_list.ni_test_frame[i].data.frame));
8751  }
8752  } else
8753  {
8754  int need_to_resend = 0;
8755  while (send_fin_flag == 0 || receive_fin_flag == 0)
8756  {
8757  (void)ni_gettimeofday(&current_time, NULL);
8758  int print_time =
8759  ((current_time.tv_sec - previous_time.tv_sec) > 1);
8760 
8761  if (need_to_resend)
8762  goto encode_send;
8763  // bitstream Sending
8764  send_fin_flag = decoder_send_data(
8765  &dec_ctx, &in_pkt, sos_flag, input_video_width,
8766  input_video_height, pkt_size, total_file_size,
8767  &total_bytes_sent, print_time, &xcodeState, p_stream_info);
8768 
8769  sos_flag = 0;
8770  if (send_fin_flag == 2) //Error
8771  {
8772  break;
8773  }
8774 
8775  // YUV Receiving: not writing to file
8776  receive_fin_flag = decoder_receive_data(
8777  &dec_ctx, &out_frame, output_video_width,
8778  output_video_height, p_file, &total_bytes_received,
8779  print_time, 0, &xcodeState, &rx_size);
8780 
8781  if (print_time)
8782  {
8783  previous_time = current_time;
8784  }
8785 
8786  if (2 == receive_fin_flag)
8787  {
8788  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
8789  "no decoder output, jump to encoder receive!\n");
8790  if (!dec_ctx.hw_action)
8791  {
8792  ni_decoder_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
8793  } else
8794  {
8795  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
8796  }
8797  goto encode_recv;
8798  } else if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == enc_ctx.session_id ||
8799  NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE == enc_ctx.blk_io_handle)
8800  {
8801  // open the encode session when the first frame arrives and the session
8802  // is not opened yet, with the source stream and user-configured encode
8803  // info both considered when constructing VUI in the stream headers
8804  int color_pri = out_frame.data.frame.color_primaries;
8805  int color_trc = out_frame.data.frame.color_trc;
8806  int color_space = out_frame.data.frame.color_space;
8807  int video_full_range_flag =
8808  out_frame.data.frame.video_full_range_flag;
8809  int sar_num = out_frame.data.frame.sar_width;
8810  int sar_den = out_frame.data.frame.sar_height;
8811  int fps_num = 0, fps_den = 0;
8812 
8813  // calculate the source fps and set it as the default target fps, based
8814  // on the timing_info passed in from the decoded frame
8815  if (out_frame.data.frame.vui_num_units_in_tick &&
8816  out_frame.data.frame.vui_time_scale)
8817  {
8818  if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 ==
8819  out_frame.data.frame.src_codec)
8820  {
8821  if (0 == (out_frame.data.frame.vui_time_scale % 2))
8822  {
8823  fps_num =
8824  (int)(out_frame.data.frame.vui_time_scale /
8825  2);
8826  fps_den = (int)(out_frame.data.frame
8827  .vui_num_units_in_tick);
8828  } else
8829  {
8830  fps_num =
8831  (int)(out_frame.data.frame.vui_time_scale);
8832  fps_den = (int)(2 *
8833  out_frame.data.frame
8834  .vui_num_units_in_tick);
8835  }
8836  } else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265 ==
8837  out_frame.data.frame.src_codec)
8838  {
8839  fps_num = out_frame.data.frame.vui_time_scale;
8840  fps_den =
8841  out_frame.data.frame.vui_num_units_in_tick;
8842  }
8843  }
8844 
8845  // set up encoder p_config, using some info from source
8846  if (ni_encoder_init_default_params(
8847  p_api_param, fps_num, fps_den, 200000, arg_width,
8848  arg_height, enc_ctx.codec_format) < 0)
8849  {
8850  fprintf(stderr,
8851  "Error: encoder init default set up error\n");
8852  break;
8853  }
8854 
8855  // check and set ni_encoder_params from --xcoder-params
8856  // Note: the parameter setting has to be in this order so that user
8857  // configured values can overwrite the source/default ones if
8858  // desired.
8859  if (ni_retrieve_xcoder_params(encConfXcoderParams, p_api_param,
8860  &enc_ctx))
8861  {
8862  fprintf(stderr,
8863  "Error: encoder p_config parsing error\n");
8864  break;
8865  }
8866 
8867  if (color_pri != p_api_param->color_primaries &&
8868  NI_COL_PRI_UNSPECIFIED != p_api_param->color_primaries)
8869  {
8870  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
8871  "Using user-configured color primaries %d to "
8872  "overwrite source %d\n",
8873  p_api_param->color_primaries, color_pri);
8874  color_pri = p_api_param->color_primaries;
8875  }
8876  if (color_trc != p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic &&
8877  NI_COL_TRC_UNSPECIFIED !=
8878  p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic)
8879  {
8880  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
8881  "Using user-configured color trc %d to overwrite"
8882  " source %d\n",
8883  p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic, color_trc);
8884  color_trc = p_api_param->color_transfer_characteristic;
8885  }
8886  if (color_space != p_api_param->color_space &&
8887  NI_COL_SPC_UNSPECIFIED != p_api_param->color_space)
8888  {
8889  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
8890  "Using user-configured color space %d to "
8891  "overwrite source %d\n",
8892  p_api_param->color_space, color_space);
8893  color_space = p_api_param->color_space;
8894  }
8895  if (p_api_param->video_full_range_flag >= 0)
8896  {
8897  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
8898  "Using user-configured video_full_range_flag %d\n",
8899  p_api_param->video_full_range_flag);
8900  video_full_range_flag = p_api_param->video_full_range_flag;
8901  }
8902  if (out_frame.data.frame.aspect_ratio_idc > 0 &&
8903  out_frame.data.frame.aspect_ratio_idc <
8904  NI_NUM_PIXEL_ASPECT_RATIO)
8905  {
8906  sar_num =
8907  ni_h264_pixel_aspect_list[out_frame.data.frame
8908  .aspect_ratio_idc]
8909  .num;
8910  sar_den =
8911  ni_h264_pixel_aspect_list[out_frame.data.frame
8912  .aspect_ratio_idc]
8913  .den;
8914  } else if (p_api_param->sar_denom)
8915  {
8916  sar_num = p_api_param->sar_num;
8917  sar_den = p_api_param->sar_denom;
8918  }
8919 
8920  ni_hrd_params_t hrd_params;
8921  if (!dec_ctx.hw_action)
8922  {
8923  enc_ctx.hw_action = NI_CODEC_HW_NONE;
8924  } else
8925  { //Items in this else condition could be improved by being handled in libxcoder
8926  enc_ctx.hw_action = NI_CODEC_HW_ENABLE;
8927  p_api_param->hwframes = 1;
8928  //to determine if from same device and buffer dimensions in memory
8929  //needs to be done where input frame is available to check
8930  p_hwframe = (niFrameSurface1_t *)out_frame.data.frame.p_data[3];
8931  enc_ctx.sender_handle =
8932  (ni_device_handle_t)(
8933  int64_t)p_hwframe->device_handle;
8934  p_api_param->rootBufId = p_hwframe->ui16FrameIdx;
8935  }
8936  if (0 !=
8937  (ret = encoder_open_session(
8938  &enc_ctx, dst_codec_format, iXcoderGUID,
8939  p_api_param, bit_depth, arg_width, arg_height,
8940  &hrd_params, color_pri, color_trc, color_space,
8941  video_full_range_flag, sar_num, sar_den,
8942  get_pixel_planar(dec_ctx.pixel_format) == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_PLANAR)))
8943  {
8944  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
8945  "Error: encoder_open_session failed, stop!\n");
8946  break;
8947  }
8948  }
8949 
8950  // encoded bitstream Receiving
8951  encode_send:
8952  need_to_resend = 0;
8953  // YUV Sending
8954  send_fin_flag = encoder_send_data2(
8955  &enc_ctx, dec_ctx.codec_format, &out_frame, &enc_in_frame,
8956  sos_flag, input_video_width, input_video_height, pfs,
8957  total_file_size, &total_bytes_sent, &xcodeState);
8958  sos_flag = 0;
8959  if (send_fin_flag < 0) //Error
8960  {
8961  if (!enc_ctx.hw_action)
8962  {
8963  ni_decoder_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
8964  } else
8965  {
8966  //pre close cleanup will clear it out
8967  uint16_t current_hwframe_index =
8968  ((niFrameSurface1_t *)((uint8_t *)out_frame.data
8969  .frame.p_data[3]))
8970  ->ui16FrameIdx;
8971  memcpy(&hwframe_pool_tracker[current_hwframe_index],
8972  (uint8_t *)out_frame.data.frame.p_data[3],
8973  sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t));
8974  }
8975  break;
8976  } else if (send_fin_flag == 2)
8977  {
8978  need_to_resend = 1;
8979  goto encode_recv;
8980  }
8981  if (enc_ctx.hw_action)
8982  { //track in array with unique index, free when enc read finds
8983  //this must be implemented in application space for complete
8984  //tracking of hwframes
8985  //If encoder write had no buffer avail space the next time we
8986  //update the tracker will be redundant
8987  uint16_t current_hwframe_index =
8988  ((niFrameSurface1_t *)((uint8_t *)out_frame.data.frame
8989  .p_data[3]))
8990  ->ui16FrameIdx;
8991  memcpy(&hwframe_pool_tracker[current_hwframe_index],
8992  (uint8_t *)out_frame.data.frame.p_data[3],
8993  sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t));
8994  ni_frame_wipe_aux_data(
8995  &(out_frame.data.frame)); //reusebuff
8996  } else
8997  {
8998  ni_decoder_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
8999  }
9000 
9001  // encoded bitstream Receiving
9002  encode_recv:
9003  prev_num_pkt = number_of_packets;
9004  receive_fin_flag = encoder_receive_data(
9005  &enc_ctx, &out_packet, output_video_width,
9006  output_video_height, p_file, &xcodeRecvTotal, print_time,
9007  &number_of_packets,
9008  &out_frame); // out_frame is passed in for future sequence change support (XCODER_APP_TRANSCODE does not support sequence change yet)
9009  recycle_index = out_packet.data.packet.recycle_index;
9010  if (prev_num_pkt < number_of_packets && //skip if nothing read
9011  enc_ctx.hw_action && recycle_index > 0 &&
9012  recycle_index < NI_GET_MAX_HWDESC_FRAME_INDEX(enc_ctx.ddr_config))
9013  //encoder only returns valid recycle index
9014  //when there's something to recycle. This range is suitable for all memory bins
9015  {
9016  if (hwframe_pool_tracker[recycle_index].ui16FrameIdx)
9017  {
9018  ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(
9019  &hwframe_pool_tracker[recycle_index],
9020  hwframe_pool_tracker[recycle_index].device_handle);
9021  //zero for tracking purposes
9022  hwframe_pool_tracker[recycle_index].ui16FrameIdx = 0;
9023  }
9024  }
9025  if (print_time)
9026  {
9027  previous_time = current_time;
9028  }
9029 
9030  // Error or encoder eos
9031  if (receive_fin_flag < 0 ||
9032  out_packet.data.packet.end_of_stream)
9033  {
9034  break;
9035  }
9036  }
9037  }
9038  unsigned int time_diff =
9039  (unsigned int)(current_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec);
9040  if (time_diff == 0)
9041  time_diff = 1;
9042 
9043  printf("[R] Got: Frames= %u fps=%f Total bytes %llu\n",
9044  number_of_frames, ((float)number_of_frames / (float)time_diff),
9045  total_bytes_received);
9046  printf("[R] Got: Packets= %u fps=%f Total bytes %llu\n",
9047  number_of_packets,
9048  ((float)number_of_packets) / ((float)time_diff), xcodeRecvTotal);
9049 
9050  num_post_recycled = scan_and_clean_hwdescriptors(hwframe_pool_tracker);
9051  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Cleanup recycled %d internal buffers\n",
9052  num_post_recycled);
9053  ni_device_session_close(&dec_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
9054 
9055  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx);
9056  rcPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
9057  sdPara.p_dec_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
9058 
9059  ni_packet_buffer_free(&(in_pkt.data.packet));
9060  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(out_frame.data.frame));
9061 
9062  ni_device_session_close(&enc_ctx, 1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
9063 
9064  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(sdPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx);
9065  rcPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
9066  sdPara.p_enc_rsrc_ctx = NULL;
9067 
9068  ni_frame_buffer_free(&(enc_in_frame.data.frame));
9069  ni_packet_buffer_free(&(out_packet.data.packet));
9070  }
9071 
9072 end:
9073 
9074 /* // disable as the following can't pass clang-tidy
9075  if ((int32_t)dec_ctx.blk_io_handle != (int32_t)NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE && (int32_t)dec_ctx.device_handle !=(int32_t) NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE)
9076  {
9077  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "xcoder app end - close decoder blk_io_handle %d device_handle %d\n", dec_ctx.blk_io_handle, dec_ctx.device_handle);
9078 #ifdef _WIN32
9079  ni_device_close(dec_ctx.device_handle);
9080 #elif __linux__
9081  ni_device_close(dec_ctx.device_handle);
9082  ni_device_close(dec_ctx.blk_io_handle);
9083 #endif
9084  }
9085 
9086  if ((int32_t)enc_ctx.blk_io_handle != (int32_t)NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE && (int32_t)enc_ctx.device_handle != (int32_t)NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE)
9087  {
9088  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "xcoder app end - close encoder blk_io_handle %d device_handle %d\n", enc_ctx.blk_io_handle, enc_ctx.device_handle);
9089 #ifdef _WIN32
9090  ni_device_close(enc_ctx.device_handle);
9091 #elif __linux__
9092  ni_device_close(enc_ctx.device_handle);
9093  ni_device_close(enc_ctx.blk_io_handle);
9094 #endif
9095  }
9096 
9097  if ((int32_t)upl_ctx.blk_io_handle != (int32_t)NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE && (int32_t)upl_ctx.device_handle != (int32_t)NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE)
9098  {
9099  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "xcoder app end - close uploader blk_io_handle %d device_handle %d\n", upl_ctx.blk_io_handle, upl_ctx.device_handle);
9100 #ifdef _WIN32
9101  ni_device_close(upl_ctx.device_handle);
9102 #elif __linux__
9103  ni_device_close(upl_ctx.device_handle);
9104  ni_device_close(upl_ctx.blk_io_handle);
9105 #endif
9106  }
9107 */
9108 
9109  ni_device_session_context_clear(&dec_ctx);
9110  ni_device_session_context_clear(&enc_ctx);
9111  ni_device_session_context_clear(&upl_ctx);
9112  ni_device_session_context_clear(&sca_ctx);
9113  ni_device_session_context_clear(&crop_ctx);
9114  ni_device_session_context_clear(&pad_ctx);
9115  ni_device_session_context_clear(&ovly_ctx);
9116  ni_device_session_context_clear(&fmt_ctx);
9117 
9118  for (i = 0; i < output_total; i++)
9119  {
9120  ni_device_session_context_clear(&enc_ladder_ctx_list[i]);
9121  }
9122 
9123  for (input_index = 0; input_index < input_total; input_index++)
9124  {
9125  if (input_arg_pfs[input_index])
9126  {
9127  close(input_arg_pfs[input_index]);
9128  }
9129  }
9130  if (p_file)
9131  {
9132  fclose(p_file);
9133  }
9134 
9135  free(p_api_param);
9136  free(p_dec_api_param);
9137  free(enc_ladder_api_param);
9138  free(g_file_cache);
9139  g_file_cache = NULL;
9140 
9141  printf("All Done.\n");
9142 
9143  return ret;
9144 }
